The cloud extinguishes small, unattended, non-magical fires and helps smother the flames on burning creatures located within the cone; creatures in this cone that are taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} can immediately attempt an additional flat DC 15 check to end the persistent damage.

Disarming Smile.name: Обезоруживающая улыбка(*)
Disarming Smile.description:
Триггер: Вы стали целью атаки ближнего боя, а атакующий еще не сделал бросок.

Требования: Вы знаете о нападавшем, нападавший является разумным гуманоидным существом, и вы не пытались причинить нападавшему вред.

Широкой искренней улыбкой вы заставляете нападающего задуматься. Вы совершаете проверку Дипломатии против КС Воли атакующего. После того, как вы используете "Обезоруживающую улыбку", все существа, бывшие свидетелями ее использования, временно становятся невосприимчивыми к вашей "Обезоруживающей улыбке" на следующие 24 часа.

Критический успех: Ваш враг прекращает атаку. Атака проваливается, и спровоцировавшая цель не может совершать враждебные действия против вас до начала своего следующего хода или до тех пор, пока вы (или ваши союзники) не предпримете враждебные действия против врага (или его союзников). Вы можете начать говорить с этим существом в свой следующий ход, чтобы сделать еще одну проверку Дипломатии, при успехе вы поддерживаете эффект до начала вашего следующего хода, максимум до 1 минуты. Разговор в последующих раундах требует, чтобы вы могли общаться с целевым существом и придает действию признаки `слуховой` и `языковой`.

Успех: Ваш противник на мгновение останавливается. Атака провалена, но он может предпринять дальнейшие атаки против вас.

Провал: Атака цели не затронута.

Discerning Gaze.name: Discerning Gaze
Discerning Gaze.description:
Источник: Night of the Gray Death

You have a sense for when people are lying. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on your secret Perception checks to Sense Motive.

If you use Sense Motive on a creature you have currently condemned with Harsh Judgment, your GM rolls the Perception check twice and takes the higher result (this is a fortune effect).

Discerning Strike.name: Discerning Strike
Discerning Strike.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide

Требования: You have successfully identified the target with Recall Knowledge during this combat.

Identifying a creature is the first step in finding its weaknesses. Attempt a Strike against the target; if successful, you deal an additional [[/r 1d6[precision]]]{1d6 precision damage}. If you have succeeded on a Recall Knowledge check against the target during this combat and their creature type was previously recorded using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.0Dy8RlFqrzCVOTl4]{Thorough Reports}, you also deal [[/r 1[bleed]]]{1 продолжительного урона кровотечением}. The creature is then temporarily immune to Discerning Strike for 1 day.

Disrupting Strikes.name: Disrupting Strikes
Disrupting Strikes.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island

You call forth positive energy from within to help you destroy undead. Your weapon and unarmed Strikes gain the effects of a disrupting property rune until the start of your next turn.

If you're 14th level or higher, your Strikes instead gain the effects of a greater disrupting property rune. The DC for the rune's effect is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Disturbing Defense.name: Disturbing Defense
Disturbing Defense.description:
Источник: Slithering

Your internal organs and blood vessels have shifted and changed, and even you don't know precisely where in your body they are. You gain resistance to precision damage equal to 2 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype. The DC of your flat checks to recover from persistent bleed damage is 13, rather than 15.

Divine Emissary.name: Divine Emissary
Divine Emissary.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Your familiar is a divine emissary, sent to you by your deity or patron and infused with celestial powers. You can select one additional familiar ability each day, which must be one of the following divine emissary familiar abilities. You can't select more than one divine emissary familiar ability at a time.

Erudite Your familiar has incredible religious knowledge. Despite being a minion, your familiar gains 1 reaction at the start of its turns, which it can use only to Aid you on a Religion check (it still has to prepare to help you as normal for the Aid reaction). It automatically succeeds its check to Aid you with Religion checks or automatically critically succeeds if you're a master in Religion.

Luminous Your familiar glows with a comforting light. It sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for the next 30 feet. It can suppress or resume this light by using an action, which has the concentrate trait.

Medic Your familiar can draw upon the power of your deity to Cast a Spell once per day. The familiar can cast the 1-action version of heal at a level 2 levels lower than your highest-level spell slot, which it can cast only on you. You must be able to cast 3rd-level spells from spell slots to select this ability.

Radiant Your familiar is filled with a divine radiance that makes it resistant to the forces of evil. Your familiar gains resistance to evil and negative damage equal to half your level.

Divine Healing.name: Divine Healing
Divine Healing.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Although you aren't a proper champion of your faith, your deity still recognizes your efforts and provides you with a small divine ability to help others. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} devotion spell.

You gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point or increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You refill your focus pool during your daily preparations, and you regain 1 Focus Point by spending 10 minutes using the Refocus activity to pray to your deity or perform service toward their causes. You are trained in divine spell attack rolls and spell DCs. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

You must refrain from performing your deity's anathema or lose the ability to cast this spell until you atone.

Drive Back.name: Drive Back
Drive Back.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: An enemy within your reach Strikes an ally adjacent to you.

Требования: You have your shield raised.

You push the enemy back and attempt to intercede between the foe and your ally. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the triggering enemy with your shield just as it attacks, pushing it back just after the attempt. Your shield has the shove trait for this Shove attempt. If the shove succeeds, you throw off your enemy's timing, and the enemy takes a -1 circumstance penalty on its attack roll against your ally.

Eclipsed Vitality.name: Eclipsed Vitality
Eclipsed Vitality.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You shroud yourself in ashes that hide the vital essence sought by life-sensing undead. You're always taking precautions when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Avoiding Notice}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hiding}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneaking} to foil lifesense, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to any creature using only precise lifesense to observe you.

Edgewatch Detective Dedication.name: Edgewatch Detective Dedication
Edgewatch Detective Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace

You become trained in Society or Thievery; if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can use Perception instead of Survival to Track, and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Experienced Tracker} skill feat.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the this archetype.

Efficient Alchemy (Paragon).name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
Efficient Alchemy (Paragon).description:
Источник: Pathfinder #150: Broken Promise

Your daily preparations are particularly efficient and plentiful. When using your infused reagents to create alchemical items during your daily preparations, you make a batch of three of a given item instead of a batch of two, or a batch of four if your field normally lets you create three of that item.

Efficient Explorer.name: Efficient Explorer
Efficient Explorer.description:
Источник: Pathfinder Kingmaker

You are more efficient at exploring uncharted territories. As long as you're in a hex that is predominantly a terrain in which you are trained in an associated Lore skill, you grant your group one additional hexploration activity.

Effortless Reach.name: Effortless Reach
Effortless Reach.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Focusing the powers of your ki to augment your blows, you stretch and lengthen your body in ways that defy logic. Your unarmed attacks gain the reach trait.

Electric Counter.name: Electric Counter
Electric Counter.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Триггер: You would take damage.

Требования: You are in Wild Winds stance.

You gain resistance to electricity equal to your level until the start of your next turn. If the triggering damage was electricity, this resistance applies to it. If the triggering damage was from a melee attack, the attacker takes [[/r 3d6[electricity]]]{3d6 electricity damage}.

Особенность: This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of ki spells you cast, either divine or occult.

Emancipator's Mask.name: Emancipator's Mask
Emancipator's Mask.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients

Your mask grants you the abilities of Whistling Kite, the Vigilant Seer, who emancipated thousands. When you are attempting a check to free someone else from an effect that immobilizes, paralyzes, or controls them, roll twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect. The GM might decide that this fortune effect applies when attempting checks to remove other conditions or effects to free another. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only one creature, you can choose to permit the target to make an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

Emblazon Divinity.name: Emblazon Divinity
Emblazon Divinity.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #150: Broken Promise

Your sacred etchings imbue objects with power. It takes you only 1 minute to emblazon a symbol using Emblazon Armament, and you can have up to four symbols emblazoned at a time. Each item can still have only one symbol emblazoned upon it, and if you exceed the limit of four, the oldest symbol disappears. These symbols can benefit even those who don't follow the deity, provided they aren't directly opposed (as determined by the GM).

You can select a different benefit for each emblazoned symbol, chosen from any you have from Emblazon Armament or other feats such as Emblazon Energy or Emblazon Antimagic.

Emissary of Peace.name: Emissary of Peace
Emissary of Peace.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Even when bloodshed is inevitable, you would rather see your foes surrender. You attempt a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} against a single foe whose Hit Points are at less than half of their maximum value, followed by an immediate Request to convince that creature to cease fighting. You take a -5 penalty to your Diplomacy check. The GM sets the DC of the Request based on the circumstances; it's generally at least a very hard DC for the creature's level. Some creatures might simply refuse, and those who agree to parley might find your arguments lacking and start fighting again.

Empathic Envoy.name: Чувствительный посланник(*)
Empathic Envoy.description: Вы считаете, что относиться к другим с уважением – это самый быстрый путь к их сердцам, и в свою очередь, другие с большей вероятностью поверят в ваши благие намерения и спишут плохое первое впечатление на случайность. Если в ходе социального взаимодействия отношение существа к вам становится ниже (например, с дружелюбного на безразличное, или с безразличного на недружелюбное), его впечатление о вас возвращается к исходному уровню через час после окончания социального взаимодействия. Эта способность не действует, если существо, с которым вы взаимодействуете, становится враждебным.

Emphatic Emissary.name: Эмфатический эмиссар(*)
Emphatic Emissary.description:
Триггер: Вы совершаете бросок инициативы

Вы можете сказать, когда дипломатия потерпела неудачу и встреча близка к развалу или драке. Вы получаете бонус обстоятельства +2 к броску инициативы. Во время своего первого хода в бою вы можете использовать "Обезоруживающую улыбку", нацеливаясь на каждое враждебное разумное гуманоидное существо, которое может вас видеть, но еще не предприняло никаких действий. Если вы решите поддержать "Обезоруживающую улыбку", вы, как обычно, поддерживаете эффект только для одного существа.

Empyreal Aura.name: Empyreal Aura
Empyreal Aura.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

As an ultimate foe of evil and protector of the innocent, your very presence is a ward against evil. Each evil creature within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} of you at the end of your turn must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC or else become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} on a critical failure). On a successful save, the creature is temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

Endurance of the Rooted Tree.name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
Endurance of the Rooted Tree.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet

Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment. You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.

In addition, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qJZZdYBdNaWRJFER]{Wholeness of Body} ki spell almost effortlessly. You can cast it as a free action that triggers at the start of your turn.

Enduring Debilitation.name: Enduring Debilitation
Enduring Debilitation.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #150: Broken Promise

Триггер: You apply a debilitation to a creature.

Частота: once per minute

You can make your debilitation last an exceptionally long time. The triggering debilitation lasts for 1 minute instead of until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.PX6WdrpzEdUzKRHx]{Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike}

Entwined Energy Ki.name: Entwined Energy Ki
Entwined Energy Ki.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island

You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities. When you gain this feat, choose either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. When you cast ki blast, you can choose to have the spell deal the type of damage you chose instead of force damage. When you cast ki form or ki strike, add the type of damage you chose to the list of damage types you can select for the spell.

Особенность: At the GM's discretion, this feat can alter other ki spells.

Esteemed Visitor.name: Esteemed Visitor
Esteemed Visitor.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers' trust. While you are in a settlement, when you roll a critical failure on a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, you get a failure instead.

Everdistant Defense.name: Everdistant Defense
Everdistant Defense.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

Триггер: A creature within your aura is targeted by a ranged attack or a creature moves through your aura.

Требования: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.

The spatial barrier of Syndara's Island has taught you that distance can foil enemies better than any armor. You warp space, causing each square within your aura that the attack or creature would move through to count as triple the distance. If this reaction is used on a ranged attack, the attack takes range increment penalties based on the adjusted range and fails if this would cause it to exceed its maximum range.

Execution.name: Execution
Execution.description:
Источник: Night of the Gray Death

Требования: You have condemned a foe with Harsh Judgment.

You swing wide, attempting to behead your condemned foe. Make a melee Strike against your condemned foe. If you hit, your condemned foe takes [[/r 8d6[precision]]]{8d6 extra precision damage} with a basic Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the condemned foe is reduced to 0 Hit Points by the execution and requires a head to live, they die. For creatures with multiple heads, this usually kills the creature only if you sever its last head. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to your Execution for 1 day.

Executioner Weapon Training.name: Executioner Weapon Training
Executioner Weapon Training.description:
Источник: Night of the Gray Death

Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck. You become trained with the following weapons: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XGtIUZ4ZNKuFx1uL]{Falchion}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.8COlYvHe6hKCXY8x]{Greataxe}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for these weapons.

Experienced Harrower.name: Опытный харолог(*)
Experienced Harrower.description: Когда вы совершаете ритуал @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ofAQyLtLEGnOIs3N]{Гадания харро}, КС для первичной проверки никогда не превышает стандартный КС уровня, а стоимость ритуала уменьшается вдвое. Если вы используете @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.OP1TkZ9ugn86W4Br]{Отличную колоду харро}, стоимость ритуала полностью снимается.

Expert Skysage Divination.name: Expert Skysage Divination
Expert Skysage Divination.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

Your studies of the stars have taught you about the mysteries of the cosmos. You learn a 4th-level spell from any spell list. At 12th level, you learn a 5th-level spell, and at 14th level, you learn a 6th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from the divination school. You become an expert with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

Expert Snowcasting.name: Expert Snowcasting
Expert Snowcasting.description: You draw ever more magical cold into your being, learning how to manipulate it to your whims. You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

Explosive Death Drop.name: Explosive Death Drop
Explosive Death Drop.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide

Требования: You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance} and have a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

You lift your enemy into the air before bringing them crashing down with a fiery detonation. Roll an Athletics check against your target's Fortitude DC. You take a -1 circumstance penalty to your check if the target is one size larger than you and a -3 circumstance penalty if it's larger than that. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your check if the target is one size smaller than you and a +3 circumstance bonus if it's smaller than that.

Критический успех: The target takes [[/r 12d6[fire]]]{12d6 fire damage} and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in an unoccupied adjacent square of your choice. The target is no longer grabbed. The target and any creature adjacent to it also each take [[/r 1d6[persistent,fire]]]{1d6 продолжительного урона огнем}.

Успех: As critical success, but the target takes [[/r 6d6[fire]]]{6d6 fire damage} instead of 12d6, and creatures don't take persistent fire damage.

Провал: The target is no longer grabbed.

Критический провал: As failure, but you fall prone.

Extradimensional Stash.name: Extradimensional Stash
Extradimensional Stash.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear. You create a small extradimensional space somewhere within in your clothing that can hold up to 5 Bulk worth of objects. The space functions as a bag of holding, but can hold only up to 5 Bulk, has no Bulk of its own, and can be Interacted with using only one hand.

In addition, when you Palm an Object, you can place it directly into this extradimensional space as long as the space has sufficient free space to hold the object.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.HEvuhktgeFXdlDKm]{Extradimensional Stash}

Eyes of the City.name: Eyes of the City
Eyes of the City.description: You can track down targets with the help of locals. You can use Diplomacy or Society, whichever you're trained in, to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} creatures in settlements. You chat with locals to help follow the trail of creatures you Track. At the GM's discretion, there might not be enough people to speak with to keep following the trail.

False Faith.name: Ложная вера(*)
False Faith.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City

Дроскар знает, что вам может понадобиться замаскироваться в обществах, выступающих против вашей веры. Проведя 1 час в молитве Дроскару, вы сможете сотворять заклинания, используя религиозный символ другого божества в качестве своей сакральной фокусировки, и вы можете обращаться с устными молитвами к этому божеству. Дроскар перехватывает ваши молитвы и отвечает на них без ведома названного бога.

Эта способность применима к религиозному символу только одного бога в одно и то же время, чтобы заставить работать другой религиозный символ, чтобы другой религиозный символ работал таким образом, требуется еще один час молитвы, а старый символ перестает работать. Вы всегда можете использовать религиозный символ Дроскара без влияния этой способности.

Familiar Foe.name: Familiar Foe
Familiar Foe.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You regularly face off against undead and can identify many with a glance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on skill checks to Recall Knowledge about undead. Whenever you roll a critical failure on a check to Recall Knowledge about undead, you get a failure instead.

Fane's Escape.name: Fane's Escape
Fane's Escape.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide

Требования: You have a deck of playing cards in your possession.

A good getaway requires a good distraction. You Interact to draw a deck of cards and flip it in a fluttering explosion, causing you to become briefly @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to all other creatures using vision as their precise sense, and then you Sneak. You have enough cover to Sneak until the end of your turn. This leaves all of the cards from the deck scattered about the room; collecting them into a deck again takes several minutes.

Fane's Fourberie.name: Fane's Fourberie
Fane's Fourberie.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide

Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

When you enter this stance, choose whether to treat playing cards in your possession as daggers or darts; you can wield a playing card in all ways as the chosen weapon until the stance ends. As long as the majority of the deck remains in your possession, any cards that are lost or thrown can be found after 1 minute. Otherwise, the remaining cards are likely lost or destroyed.

A character who has this feat can enchant a single deck of playing cards as a magic weapon, etching fundamental and property runes directly onto the deck of cards.

Farabellus Flip.name: Farabellus Flip
Farabellus Flip.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide

Триггер: An enemy targets you with a melee Strike.

Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

Flinging your body into a twisting somersault, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against the triggering attack. If the attack still hits you, you can Step to an open space that's still within the triggering enemy's reach, turning the impact of the blow into momentum.

Fearsome Fangs.name: Fearsome Fangs
Fearsome Fangs.description: Your claws and jaws are brutally powerful and efficient, even by ursine standards. The base damage of your jaws unarmed attack from Ursine Avenger Form increases to [[/r 1d12]]. The base damage of your claws unarmed attack from Ursine Avenger Form increases to [[/r 1d8]].

Feeling Your Oats.name: Feeling Your Oats
Feeling Your Oats.description:
Частота: раз в час

You are incredible, impeccable, an icon of style and grace—and everyone knows it. In this moment, you are living your fantasy, and no one can shake you out of it. Roll a Deception check. You can substitute the result of your Deception check for one Will save you would be required to attempt in the next minute.

Final Rest.name: Final Rest
Final Rest.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

As stubborn in death as you are in life, you vow you'll never aid your hated enemies. You can't be transformed into an undead, except by effects that originate from an artifact or deity. Undead creatures that touch your corpse take [[/r 1[positive]]]{1 positive Damage} each time they do, or [[/r 1d6[positive]]]{1d6 positive damage} each time they expose themselves to your corpse in a more thorough manner, such as by biting or carrying your corpse.

First Frost.name: First Frost
First Frost.description: The gelid shard within your heart may sap your ability to feel and experience emotion, but it also lets you create and manipulate cold. You learn to cast spontaneous spells and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with the frost's touch and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} cantrips. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane spells. Your key spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Flailtongue.name: Flailtongue
Flailtongue.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger

Your tongue has mutated into a lashing weapon reminiscent of Kabriri's bone-laden flail. You can use a free action to unhinge your lower jaw and sprout rigid bones from your tongue. You gain an unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage. Until you use an Interact action to reset your jaw and retract your tongue, you can't make a jaws Strike. Your flailtongue is in the flail weapon group and has the disarm, sweep, and trip traits.

Flash Your Badge.name: Flash Your Badge
Flash Your Badge.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg

You make a fearsome show of your authority. Roll Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} each creature in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. When you do so, Demoralize gains the visual trait, and creatures are affected if they can see you. If a target creature hasn't broken a law in the past week (as determined by the GM), the result of your check against that creature is one degree of success worse than the result you rolled.

Flashing Shield.name: Flashing Shield
Flashing Shield.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: You use the Shield Block reaction, and the opponent that triggered the Shield Block is undead and adjacent to you.

Your shield flares with holy light as you block the attack, searing the undead with the power of your faith. The triggering undead takes positive damage equal to half your level and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round.

Fleeing Diversion.name: Fleeing Diversion
Fleeing Diversion.description: You are quick to capitalize on your distractions. If you critically succeed at your check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion} against the majority of the creatures (at least half of the creatures) whose attention you're trying to divert, you can use your reaction to immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, or Step. As normal, you are only @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to creatures against which you succeed on your check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion}, even if you manage to Hide or Sneak away.

Fleet Tempo.name: Fleet Tempo
Fleet Tempo.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

Частота: раз в час

To rush after a criminal or reach someone in need, you ring a sprightly tone. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.pQ9e5njvIOe5QzFa]{Effect: Fleet Tempo}

Flourishing Finish.name: Flourishing Finish
Flourishing Finish.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing

Требования: Your last action was a Strike that dropped an opponent to 0 Hit Points.

Attempt a Performance check, comparing the result to the Will DC of each foe within 30 feet who can see you. Regardless of the result, each target is immune to your Flourishing Finish for 10 minutes.

Критический успех: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Успех: The target is frightened 1.

Focused Juggler.name: Focused Juggler
Focused Juggler.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

Archetype @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Juggler}

Триггер: Your turn begins.

You continue Juggling until the end of your next turn. Increase the maximum number of items you can juggle by one.

Folklorist Dedication.name: Folklorist Dedication
Folklorist Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

You are a master archivist and entertainer, capable of pulling wisdom from the tales you tell and weaving your allies and enemies into a powerful narrative. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spin Tale} action.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the folklorist archetype.

Folktales Lore.name: Folktales Lore
Folktales Lore.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

You can pull bits of wisdom from any tale. You become trained in Folktales Lore, a special Lore skill that can be used only to Recall Knowledge, but on any topic. If you fail a check to Recall Knowledge with Folktales Lore, you get the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

If you are legendary in the Performance skill, you gain expert proficiency in Folktales Lore, but you can't increase your proficiency rank in Folktales Lore by any other means.

For Love, For Lightning.name: For Love, For Lightning
For Love, For Lightning.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Доступ: A character who performs a specialized mission for Clarethe Iomedar has access to this option.

Rumors suggest this technique was pioneered by knights who undertook missions for Clarethe Iomedar at the half-moon, but many Crimson Reclaimers have since mastered it. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mtxMpGWpwwWSbySj]{For Love, For Lightning} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to recite the Crimson Oath and meditate on its teachings; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your knight reclaimant focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs. Charisma is the key spellcasting ability for knight reclaimant focus spells.

Frightful Condemnation.name: Frightful Condemnation
Frightful Condemnation.description:
Источник: Night of the Gray Death

Триггер: You hit your condemned foe with a melee Strike in the same turn during which you condemned it with Harsh Judgment.

Требования: You have condemned a foe to death with Harsh Judgment.

Your willingness to follow through on your pitiless judgment is frightful to the person you have condemned, and they begin to dread what you will do to them next. Your condemned foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} if the triggering Strike was a critical hit.

Frostbite Runes.name: Frostbite Runes
Frostbite Runes.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth

Thick tattoos, each one a rune fragment from the saumen kar's long-lost language spelling out their pact with their equally lost deity, cover your body and stretch across your limbs, torso, and face. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against evil and necromancy spells and effects. You can sense the presence of evil undead as a pervasive taste of oily corruption in the air; this is a vague sense that allows you to know when such a creature is within 60 feet of you, though you can't precisely pinpoint their location with this sense. As normal for a vague sense, it can be fooled, but undead might not realize they need to take precautions against it. This sense also extends to living creatures who have the negative healing ability, like dhampir.

You deal an additional 1 cold damage with all Strikes made with an ice-crafted weapon. If you have the Crown of the Saumen Kar feat, you deal an additional 1 cold damage with your unarmed horns Strikes.

Frozen Breadth.name: Frozen Breadth
Frozen Breadth.description: Your attunement to arcane cold enhances the depths of your growing power. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and number of spell slots you gain from gelid shard archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest gelid shard spell slots.

Game Hunter Dedication.name: Game Hunter Dedication
Game Hunter Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon

You are skilled at tracking big game animals and similar creatures. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} action, but you can designate only animals, beasts, and dragons as prey. In addition to the other benefits of Hunt Prey, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks against your hunted prey.

When you succeed at a Strike against your hunted prey while it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, it must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC. On a failure, the prey's Speeds are each reduced by 10 feet for 1 round; on a critical failure, the duration of this effect is 1 minute. The prey is then temporarily immune to this effect for 10 minutes.

If you already have Hunt Prey, you become an expert in Survival. You apply the Stealth bonus and the Speed reduction only when your prey is an animal, beast, or dragon.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the game hunter archetype.

Garden Path.name: Garden Path
Garden Path.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn

You can guide your crop to move without notice. When you and any of your crop are Avoiding Notice, you can choose one member of your crop to temporarily gain the benefits of the Quiet Allies skill feat until the group is no longer Avoiding Notice. The group rolls two checks instead of one, using the higher die roll. This is a fortune effect.

Gardener's Resolve.name: Gardener's Resolve
Gardener's Resolve.description:
Источник: Night of the Gray Death

Частота: раз в день

Триггер: You roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on a Will save against a fear effect.

The Gray Gardeners are known for having nerves of steel and an unbreakable resolve. When you would be overwhelmed by terror, you can draw upon this resolve to keep your composure and remain undaunted. You take mental damage equal to twice your level, and the saving throw is a success.

Ghost Eater Dedication.name: Ghost Eater Dedication
Ghost Eater Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island

You have trained as a ghost eater, a hunter specialized in the destruction of spirits. You know how to channel your own spiritual energy to harm spirits. Your weapon and unarmed attack Strikes become magical. Against incorporeal creatures, they also gain the effects of a ghost touch property rune.

Особенность: You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from this archetype.

Ghost Wrangler.name: Ghost Wrangler
Ghost Wrangler.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Spirits around you coalesce upon your fists, enabling you to seize and harm other ghosts and spirits. Until the beginning of your next turn, your fists gain the effects of the ghost touch property rune, and you can make Strength-based skill checks against incorporeal creatures.

Giant Hunter.name: Giant Hunter
Giant Hunter.description:
Источник: Pathfinder Kingmaker

You have studied giants and hunt them with efficiency. When you roll initiative and can see a giant, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} as a free action, designating that enemy as your prey.

You can use this free action even if you haven't identified the giant yet with Recall Knowledge. The benefit doesn't apply against giants disguised as other creatures, and the GM determines whether it applies against a creature disguised as a giant.

Giant Slayer.name: Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.description:
Источник: Pathfinder Kingmaker

Your well-placed blows can fell mighty giants. If you critically hit the same giant twice on the same turn, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)] saving throw or die. Use your class DC for this saving throw.

Gigantic Megafauna Companion.name: Gigantic Megafauna Companion
Gigantic Megafauna Companion.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra

The mammoths and other megafauna ridden by your people are larger than any ordinary beast. Your megafauna companion increases in size to Huge but doesn't otherwise change its statistics.

Glass Skin.name: Glass Skin
Glass Skin.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun

Prerequisites You were present at the death of the medusa Alethsia, whose vitrumantic powers were passed on to you in the wake of her destruction.

Even if vitrumancy is a mystery to you, your blood and flesh know the secrets of the art of arcane glass. Patches of your skin to flicker into glass without warning. By focusing the effect, you can concentrate the glass into a powerful protective layer of magical obsidian. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin} on yourself as an innate primal spell, though the spell covers you in a layer of glass instead of stone. During this innate stoneskin, you gain the Shatter Glass reaction. At 18th level, the stoneskin is heightened to 6th level instead of 4th.

Shatter Glass r

Триггер: An adjacent creature Strikes you with a melee weapon or unarmed attack and deals damage

Требования: Your innate stoneskin from Glass Skin is active

Effect You shatter some of the glass on your skin to damage your attacker. The attacker takes [[/r 3d10[slashing]]]{3d10 slashing damage} and the duration of the stoneskin decreases by 1 minute. At 14th level, the damage increases to [[/r 4d10[slashing]]]{4d10 slashing damage}, and at 18th level, the damage increases to [[/r 5d10[slashing]]]{5d10 slashing damage}.

Golden Body.name: Golden Body
Golden Body.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #150: Broken Promise

You perfect your body, refining the flex of every muscle and the bend of every joint to maximum efficiency. Your unarmed Strikes gain the deadly d12 trait, and you have fast healing 20, causing you to regain 20 HP at the start of each of your turns provided you have at least 1 HP.

Golden League Xun Dedication.name: Golden League Xun Dedication
Golden League Xun Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

You are a xun for the Golden League, aiding the organization. You gain expert proficiency in two of the following skills (or in two other skills of your choice in which you're trained, if you were already an expert in the listed skills): Athletics, Deception, Intimidation, or Stealth. In addition, if you use Underworld Lore to Earn Income or Recall Knowledge, when you get a success, you get a critical success instead.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the Golden League Xun archetype.

Golem Grafter Dedication.name: Golem Grafter Dedication
Golem Grafter Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #163: Life's Long Shadow

Archetype @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.archetypes.XATPzPTZ9Je89erT]{Golem Grafter}

Your flesh has been specially treated with the same arcane and alchemical processes used to toughen the skin of flesh golems. Increase your maximum Hit Points by an amount equal to your level. You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to your number of class feats from the golem grafter archetype.

Особенность: You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the golem grafter archetype.

Grand Medic's Mask.name: Grand Medic's Mask
Grand Medic's Mask.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients

Your mask is infused with restorative magic associated with Ibex, the Flourishing Field, so it constantly repairs itself. You gain fast healing 5. If you lose a limb or other body part, it regrows within 1 day. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only one creature, you can choose to have the spell also give that creature temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's level until the start of your next turn.

Grave Sight.name: Grave Sight
Grave Sight.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Your ability to sense undead has improved. You sense undead as an imprecise sense with a range of 60 feet: an uncomfortable sensation brushes against your spirit and stinks of rot. When in proximity to an undead, you can sense its presence, but it has the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} condition instead of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} condition. An undead using a disguise or otherwise trying to hide its presence must attempt a Deception or Stealth check against your Perception DC to hide its presence from you. If the creature succeeds, it's undetected, and you have to use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} basic action to detect the creature. As with hearing and other imprecise senses, you still need to Seek to locate an undetected creature.

Gravelands Herbalist.name: Gravelands Herbalist
Gravelands Herbalist.description:
Источник: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Доступ: Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

Your time with the Knights of Lastwall has taught you the secrets of creating and improving upon @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.VeCNWhvEr82ZNoSV]{Lastwall Soup}. Add Lastwall soup to your list of herbal items. At 10th level, you can make @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.VcEd9Bh4q5vQfpLv]{Lastwall Soup (Improved)} that grants a +3 item bonus. At 18th level, you can make @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.ed8gAxli6Of58kAM]{Lastwall Soup (Greater)} that grants a +4 item bonus, and its nourishing properties grant you 10 temporary Hit Points that last up to 10 minutes after eating it.

Graveshift.name: Graveshift
Graveshift.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger

Частота: раз в день

Требования: You are standing at the bottom of an open grave adjacent to up to four willing target creatures or objects roughly the size of a creature.

The maggots inhabiting your body impart you with the knowledge to travel from grave to grave, drawing upon the mystical power of the labyrinthine network of magical warrens and tunnels that connect Everglut to the Material Plane. You can spend 10 minutes channeling this power to transport you and all target creatures or objects that are inside the grave you are standing in to a chosen grave you are aware of (unoccupied or occupied) within 100 miles. When you target an occupied or filled grave, you and all transported creatures and objects appear scattered aboveground around the targeted grave (or belowground in adjacent tunnels or passageways if available).

Great Bear.name: Great Bear
Great Bear.description:
Частота: раз в час

When you transform, you can take on a bear's bulk and size. You can spend an additional action when using Ursine Avenger Form to gain the effects of a 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} spell, which lasts for the spell's normal duration or until you leave your Ursine Avenger Form, whichever comes first.

Greater Snow Step.name: Greater Snow Step
Greater Snow Step.description: You can't be impeded by environmental effects that rely on cold or its byproducts. You ignore greater difficult terrain caused by snow and ice.

Greater Sun Blessing.name: Greater Sun Blessing
Greater Sun Blessing.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple-City

Your connection to the Old Sun Gods grows stronger. You gain an advanced domain spell from a domain you chose with Blessing of the Sun Gods. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Особенность: You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, you must select a different domain for which you have an initial domain spell from Blessing of the Sun Gods.

Grudging Compliment.name: Grudging Compliment
Grudging Compliment.description:
Триггер: An enemy within 30 feet damages you or succeeds at a skill check.

Every Firebrand can recognize the skill of others, but you've turned it into an art you can wield in combat. You compliment a foe's form or technique, and your unexpected praise distracts them from their surroundings. Attempt a Diplomacy check against that enemy's Will DC. Regardless of your result, they are temporarily immune to your Grudging Compliments for 10 minutes.

Критический успех: The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round.

Успех: The target becomes flat-footed against your attacks for 1 round.

Guarded Advance.name: Guarded Advance
Guarded Advance.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You slowly advance on the battlefield, taking utmost caution. You either Step and Raise a Shield or Raise a Shield and Step.

Guardian's Embrace.name: Защитные объятия(*)
Guardian's Embrace.description:
Требования: Вы находитесь рядом со своим духовным проводником или он делит с вами пространство.

Ваш духовный наставник распадается, чтобы окружить вас невидимым защитным покровом. Вы получаете бонус состояния +2 к КБ против физических атак до начала вашего следующего хода. Если в это время вы подверглись физической атаке, вы можете реакцией получить сопротивление 10 к физическому урону, нанесенному этой атакой, при этом прекращая бонус к КБ, и вы не можете снова использовать Защитные объятия в течение 10 минут. Ваш духовный проводник не может быть целью эффектов, на него не могут воздействовать эффект по области, и он не может предпринимать никаких действий, пока эта способность активна. Ваш духовный проводник появляется в пространстве рядом с вами, когда эффект заканчивается.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.X19XgqqItqZ4tfmq]{Эффект: Защитные объятия}

Guided Skill.name: Направляемый навык(*)
Guided Skill.description:
Частота: раз в день

Вы просите своего духовного наставника о помощи. В течение следующих 10 минут вы получаете бонус состояния +2 к проверкам, сделанным с помощью Акробатики, Оккультизма, Скрытности или Выживания.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.iaZ6P59YVhdnFIN8]{Эффект: Направляемый навык}

Half-Truths.name: Half-Truths
Half-Truths.description: You are able to weave your words in such a way that you never use actual lies, but still mislead people to certain conclusions. You can attempt to make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request} of a creature using Deception instead of Diplomacy. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} to a creature using Diplomacy instead of Deception. If you fail your check to Lie, the creature realizes that you were twisting words to fool them without outright lying.

Hamstringing Strike.name: Hamstringing Strike
Hamstringing Strike.description:
Источник: Pathfinder Kingmaker

You slow your foes with a well-aimed attack. Make a Strike against your hunted prey with a -2 penalty. If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed. A creature immune to bleed damage does not take this penalty. The penalty can be removed using any method that removes persistent bleed damage or offers a flat check to do so, such as Administer First Aid.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.ESnzqtwSgahLcxg2]{Effect: Hamstringing Strike}

Handy with your Paws.name: Handy with your Paws
Handy with your Paws.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #163: Life's Long Shadow

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repair} non-magical items, and you don't need a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.vLGDUFrg4yGzpTQX]{Repair Kit} for such repairs as long as you have any amount of junk, spare parts, or debris at your disposal.

Harrow Casting.name: Колдовство харро(*)
Harrow Casting.description:
Требования: У вас есть активное знамение харро.

Вы берете карту из своей колоды харро непосредственно перед тем, как сотворить заклинание, чтобы наполнить вашу магию предназначенным для нее потенциалом. Если вашим следующим действием будет @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Сотворение заклинания}, масть карты, которую вы взяли, усиливает заклинание одним из следующих способов. Если карта, которую вы вытягиваете, соответствует масти вашего активного предзнаменования, эффект усиливается, как описано ниже. Когда вы используете Колдовство харро, совершите @Check[type:flat|dc:11]. Если вы провалите эту проверку, вы потеряете активное знамение харро в конце своего хода.

Молот: Мощь заклинания увеличивается. Этот эффект усиливает только атакующие заклинания, нацеленные на одну цель, которые требуют успешный бросок атаки заклинанием или требуют спасброска от цели для сопротивления. Если вы попадаете в цель или цель проваливает спасбросок, заклинание наносит дополнительный урон силой, равный уровню заклинания. Этот дополнительный урон удваивается, если вашим знамением харро является карта Молотов.

Ключ: Часть магии остается позади, усиливая вашу защиту. До начала вашего следующего хода вы получаете бонус состояния +1 к КБ и всем спасброскам. Если вашим знамением харро является карта Ключей, бонус состояния увеличивается до +2.

Щит: Когда магия заклинания начинает действовать, она исцеляет вас, восстанавливая ОЗ равные 2d6 + уровень заклинания. Если вашим знамением харро является карта Щитов – восстановленные ОЗ увеличиваются до 4d6 + удвоенный уровень заклинания.

Книга: Магия заклинания наполняет ваш разум внезапным пониманием цели. Вы можете совершить Вспомнить информацию о цели в качестве свободного действия, используя бросок атаки заклинанием для проверки. Вы получаете бонус состояния +2 к этому броску, если вашим знамением харро является карта Книг.

Звезда: Магия заклинания поддерживает тех, кому оно помогает. Этот эффект усиливает только заклинания сотворяему юна одну готовую цель. Магия восстанавливает ОЗ затронутой цели на 2d6 + уровень заклинания. Если вашим знамением харро является карта Звезд, магия также предоставляет цели бонус состояния +2 ко всем спасброскам до начала вашего следующего хода.

Корона: Магия заклинания скрыта и изощрена, и наблюдатели могут не заметить, что вы делаете что-то большее, чем манипуляции с картами в колоде харро. Совершите проверку Знаний Предсказания будущего против КС Восприятия всех наблюдателей. Если ваша проверка против КС Восприятия наблюдателя успешна, этот наблюдатель не заметит, что вы сотворяете заклинание, даже если обычно заклинания имеют сенсорные проявления. Это скрывает только сотворение заклинания и его проявления, но не его эффекты. Если вашим знамением харро является карта Корон, вы получаете бонус состояния +2 к своей проверке Знаний Предсказания будущего.

Harrow Ritualist.name: Ритуалист харро(*)
Harrow Ritualist.description: Вы сразу же изучаете два из следующих ритуалов: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4Cntq9odgW6xMpAs]{Астральная проекция}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gsYEuWv04XTDxe91]{Вызов духа}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.7DN13ILADW2N9Z1t]{Причащение}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.l4LFwY7iuzX6sDXr]{Общение с природой}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hp6Q64dl7xbdn4gQ]{Легендарные знания} или @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Планарный призыв}. Когда вы сотворяете любой ритуал, вы можете включить в ритуал колоду харро, чтобы получить бонус состояния +2 ко всем проверкам навыков, сделанным для разрешения эффектов ритуала. Вы можете брать эту способность более одного раза; каждый раз, когда вы это делаете, вы изучаете два новых ритуала.

Harrower Dedication.name: Посвящение харолога(*)
Harrower Dedication.description:
Вы становитесь обучены Оккультизму; если вы уже обучены этому навыку, вместо этого вы обучены другому навыку по вашему выбору. Вы также становитесь обучены Знаниям Предсказания будущего и выучиваете ритуал @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ofAQyLtLEGnOIs3N]{Гадание харро}.

Кроме того, раз в день, когда вы совершаете свои ежедневные приготовления, вы можете выполнить чтение харро для себя, если у вас есть доступ к колоде харро. Возьмите карту из своей колоды харро – масть этой карты становится вашим активным знамением харро на следующие 24 часа и изменяет несколько других способностей харро, как подробно описано дальше. Вы получаете реакцию @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ePfdZYZRmycMpSWU]{Избежать ужасной судьбы}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.rp6hA52dWVwtuu5F]{Эффект: Знамение харро}

Особенность: Вы не можете выбрать другую способность посвящения, пока не получите две других способности архетипа @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.OtBPlgtudM4PlTWD]{Харолога}. Если вы переучите эту способность, вы потеряете ритуал Гадания Харро, которому научились благодаря ему.

Harsh Judgement.name: Harsh Judgement
Harsh Judgement.description:
Источник: Night of the Gray Death

Choose one creature you can see, and loudly declare the creature's life forfeit by your judgment. That creature becomes your condemned foe until they are defeated, you use Harsh Judgment on a different creature, or the encounter ends. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

You typically can use Harsh Judgment only during an encounter, and if you try to use it to declare someone's life forfeit during exploration or downtime, you are likely to start an encounter.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.raoz523QRsj5WjcF]{Effect: Harsh Judgement}

Head of the Night Parade.name: Head of the Night Parade
Head of the Night Parade.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display. You Perform and cast 8th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tFKJCPvOQZxKq6ON]{Mad Monkeys} three times, except that the spell calls various apparitions such as dancing tsukumogami or drinking oni rather than monkeys. Each casting can produce a different kind of mischief. You can Sustain all three Spells each round using a single Perform action.

Heart of the Kaiju.name: Heart of the Kaiju
Heart of the Kaiju.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

Witnessing the might of the kaiju King Mogaru, Alru, and Toraloa up close awoke a new ferocity within you. When you transform using Monstrosity Shape, you can take on a kaiju form. When you take this feat, choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage; this is the damage your breath weapon deals. You can't change this later. The battle form is Gargantuan size with the following specific abilities; the damage values already include the extra die from being a 9th-level spell.

Kaiju Speed 40 feet; physical resistance 5; Melee 1 jaws (reach 20 feet), Урон:[[/r 3d12+20[piercing]]]{3d12+20 piercing damage}; Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 20 feet), Урон:[[/r 3d8+20[slashing]]]{3d8+20 slashing damage}

Breath Weapon2 (evocation, primal) Each creature in a 60-foot cone takes [[/r 15d6[untyped]]]{15d6 damage} (of your chosen damage type), with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Helt's Spelldance.name: Helt's Spelldance
Helt's Spelldance.description: Ranik Helt knows a special technique to hide his spells as part of a performance, and you've learned this technique. Ostentatiously performing, you move across the battlefield, taking foes aback and creating an opening for your spell. Attempt a Performance check against all observers' Perception DCs. Then, Stride once or twice. During this movement, you don't trigger reactions that are triggered by your movement from the creatures against which you succeeded on your Performance check. After your movement, you can Cast a Spell. If you used one Stride, you can cast either a 1-action or a 2-action spell; if you used two Strides, you can only cast a 1-action spell. If you critically succeed on your check against any creature, they take a –1 circumstance penalty to their saving throws against any spell you cast as part of your Helt's Spelldance due to your distracting performance. All creatures that observed you become temporarily immune to your Helt's Spelldance for 10 minutes.

Hideous Ululation.name: Hideous Ululation
Hideous Ululation.description:
Источник: The Slithering

Your throat has multiple separate chambers that can give your voice an eerie echo. You can be clearly heard at distances of up to 300 feet regardless of ambient sound, although your voice doesn't penetrate a magical @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} effect.

Hijack Undead.name: Hijack Undead
Hijack Undead.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun

Частота: раз в час

Your clockwork devices can commandeer the bodies of undead, bending them to your will. Make a melee Strike against an adjacent undead creature. On a success, instead of taking damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} by you if its level is equal to or lower than your level - 3. It can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC to resist being controlled by you. If the target is already under someone else's command, the controlling creature also rolls a saving throw, and the undead uses the better result.

Критический успех: The target is unaffected and temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Успех: The target is unaffected.

Провал: The undead creature becomes a minion under your control for 1 minute. The control ends if you or an ally attacks the minion undead.

Критический провал: As failure, but the duration is 1 hour.

Hilt Hammer.name: Hilt Hammer
Hilt Hammer.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You know how to turn any weapon into a bone-crushing implement of skeletal destruction. Melee weapons you wield gain the versatile B trait. You can use the weapon only to deal bludgeoning damage when making melee attacks. At the GM's discretion, specific weapons might not be able to gain the versatile B trait.

Holy Light.name: Holy Light
Holy Light.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You raise your arms to the sky and pray fervently, surrounding yourself in a beacon of holy light. The beacon sheds bright light in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30]{30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder} centered on you until the beginning of your next turn. Evil creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save equal to your class DC or spell DC (whichever is higher) or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Hook 'Em.name: Hook 'Em
Hook 'Em.description:
Требования: A rope is within your reach, or you have a rope or grappling weapon in your hand.

The Salt Breakers learned to use whatever they could during the Vidric Revolution, and they quickly mastered the art of making a rope into a useful tool in combat. You take hold of a nearby rope, throw a rope from your hand, or fire a grappling weapon at a solid surface—and then swing up to twice your Speed. If you end your movement next to an enemy, attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} that enemy, tying them up in your rope.

Ice Crafter.name: Ice Crafter
Ice Crafter.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth

The ancient ice-crafting techniques of the saumen kar awaken within you. You become trained in Crafting, or become an expert if you were already trained. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xWY5omyIcILNR7y1]{Magical Crafting} skill feat. You can craft permanent items out of ice instead of metal or wood; these items are a translucent crystal-blue in color, resemble icicles and glacier ice, and have the same statistics and properties as cold iron, including the price and the ability to deal additional damage to certain kinds of creatures. Any creature who wields or wears a piece of ice-crafted equipment takes 1 cold damage each round from contact with the primal cold of the crafted ice.

Icy Apotheosis.name: Icy Apotheosis
Icy Apotheosis.description: You are as much a creature of cold as whatever ancestry you were born to. You are immune to cold damage and gain the cold trait. You automatically succeed on saving throws against effects that have the cold trait.

Illusory Identity.name: Illusory Identity
Illusory Identity.description:
There are times when skills or looks are not enough to convince someone of your identity, and you instead require adequate documentation. Replicating the methods of the Sapphire Butterfly, you've learned to use magic to forge a new identity as you need it. During your daily preparations, you can choose a blank piece of paper, journal, badge, or similar item normally used to display authority, to magically invest. You can use an Interact action to mentally outline the basic information that is displayed when that item is presented to another creature, such as a name, a title, connection to an existing group or agency, and other basic details. A more complex outline requires more time, at the GM's discretion. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.skills.deception.dc.value)] save against your Deception DC. This item only works while you are holding it and appears blank if anyone else attempts to use it, though you can include others within the details of your outline.

Критический успех: The target sees the item as being entirely blank, and becomes immune to this effect until your next daily preparations.

Успех: The target sees only the basic information listed out in a simplistic manner, as described in the Interact action. Though not fully convinced, the target plays along, but this worsens the target's attitude toward you by one step.

Провал: The target sees the information presented by the item in the proper format relevant to your situation, with the appropriate language, names, dates, signatures, and other details.

Critical Failure The target sees the information presented by the item as granting a higher level of authority than anticipated, and immediately treats you with the proper deference. As failure, and the target's attitude toward you immediately improves by one step.

Ilverani Purist.name: Пурист илверани(*)
Ilverani Purist.description: Все сумеречные ораторы обучены сопротивляться соблазнительным обычаям молодых народов, но вы взяли на себя обязательство сохранять неизменным образ жизни ильверани. Такая самоотверженность натренировала ваш глаз на хитрость и обман. Когда вы пытаетесь @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Понять намерение} гуманоидного существа, не являющегося эльфом и выпадает критический провал, вместо этого вы получаете провал.

Imbue Mindlessness.name: Imbue Mindlessness
Imbue Mindlessness.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast

You grasp the mind of an undead creature and temporarily wipe it as empty as a zombie's brain. You can target any undead with your divine innate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell, not just mindless undead. When you target one non-mindless undead creature with this spell, you can transform its effects. Instead of harm's normal effects, the target must attempt a Will save.

Критический успех: The target is unaffected.

Успех: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Провал: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 minute. While it is stupefied, you can use your Corpse Tender feats on the target as though it were mindless.

Критический провал: As failure, except the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for 10 minutes.

Immortal Bear.name: Immortal Bear
Immortal Bear.description: Your body thrums with the primal vitality of the greatest of the ursine beasts. When in Ursine Avenger Form, you gain fast healing 5.

Improved Command Corpse.name: Improved Command Corpse
Improved Command Corpse.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xYakFeP6olBsxpZN]{Command Undead} on a mindless undead, if the undead succeeds at its save but doesn't critically succeed, it becomes your minion for 1 round. If the undead fails its save, it becomes your minion for 1 hour. If it critically fails, it becomes your minion for 24 hours.

Improved Hijack Undead.name: Improved Hijack Undead
Improved Hijack Undead.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun

Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands. When you use Hijack Undead, if the undead fails its save, it becomes your minion for 10 minutes. If it critically fails, it becomes your minion for 24 hours.

Improvisational Defender.name: Improvisational Defender
Improvisational Defender.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times. When you use an improvised weapon or a shoddy weapon, you don't take the -2 item penalty to attack rolls.

Improvisational Warrior.name: Improvisational Warrior
Improvisational Warrior.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

When you use an improvised weapon, you apply the critical specialization of a brawling weapon to it. Depending on the shape and nature of the improvised weapon, your GM might determine another weapon group's critical specialization is more appropriate.

Incredible Megafauna Companion.name: Incredible Megafauna Companion
Incredible Megafauna Companion.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra

Under your care and training, your megafauna companion has realized its innate potential. Your companion becomes an indomitable or savage animal companion (your choice), gaining additional abilities determined by the type of companion.

Incredible Reanimated Companion.name: Incredible Reanimated Companion
Incredible Reanimated Companion.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun

You imbue the necrotized flesh of your reanimated construct companion with strange chemicals and fine-tune the clockwork within, enhancing all its capabilities. It becomes an incredible construct companion.

Innocent Butterfly.name: Innocent Butterfly
Innocent Butterfly.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island

You know how to alter the perceptions of others. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VUMtDHr8CRwwr3Mj]{Aura of the Unremarkable} once per day as an innate arcane spell. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Insistent Command.name: Insistent Command
Insistent Command.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God

When you roll a success to Command an Animal, you get a critical success; if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure.

Inspiring Resilience.name: Inspiring Resilience
Inspiring Resilience.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: You and at least one other creature become the target of a spell or effect with the emotion, fear, or mental trait that allows a saving throw, and you haven't rolled the save yet.

You show defiance in times of hardship and inspire your companions to persevere. Allies within 30 feet of you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.qM4bQfcwZ0EOS2M9]{Effect: Inspiring Resilience}

Instant Armor.name: Instant Armor
Instant Armor.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

A knight is nothing without their armor, and you know how to keep yours ready. You can perform a 10-minute ritual, which has the conjuration and magical traits, to divert a set of heavy armor you are wearing into an extradimensional space connected to you. While the armor is in this space, you can use a three-action activity, which has the concentrate, conjuration, and teleportation traits, to phase the armor back and instantly don it. The armor automatically phases away if you don another set of armor, if you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, or if you die. If you are incapable of wearing the armor when it phases back, it appears in your square instead.

Instinctual Interception.name: Instinctual Interception
Instinctual Interception.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You react to movement with hardly a thought, seeming constantly poised to spring. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to Interrupt Charge.

Interrupt Charge.name: Interrupt Charge
Interrupt Charge.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: A foe within reach attempts to move away from you.

Требования: You have a hand free.

You attempt to snag the foe before they run away. Attempt an Athletics check against the higher of the triggering creature's Athletics DC or Fortitude DC.

Критический успех: You disrupt the movement.

Успех: You are able to slow the triggering creature down. It takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for the rest of its triggering movement. This penalty might cause the triggering creature's movement to end immediately based on its affected Speed.

Провал: As success, but the creature instead takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed.

Inured to Alchemy.name: Inured to Alchemy
Inured to Alchemy.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg

Доступ: You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.

You've developed control over how your body processes alchemical poisons and drugs. Each of your successful saving throws against an alchemical poison, a drug, or an addiction reduces the stage by 2, or by 1 for a virulent alchemical poison, drug, or addiction. Each critical success reduces the stage by 3, or by 2 for a virulent alchemical poison, drug, or addiction.

Invigorating Breath.name: Бодрящее дыхание(*)
Invigorating Breath.description:
Частота: раз в час

Требования: Вы находитесь рядом со своим духовным проводником или он делит ваше пространство

Ваш духовный проводник выдыхает на вас свое сладко пахнущее дыхание, давая вам силы справиться с болью. Вы получаете 20 ВОЗ на 10 минут. На 15-м уровне вместо этого вы получаете 30 ВОЗ на 10 минут.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.tl94WHJ2Hg0akK2o]{Эффект: Бодрящее дыхание}

Invulnerable Juggernaut.name: Invulnerable Juggernaut
Invulnerable Juggernaut.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad

You are unstoppable, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease. You gain resistance equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier to all damage, and your resistance from raging resistance increases to 8 + your Constitution modifier.

In addition, if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, you can end your rage as a reaction to stay at 1 Hit Point. If you do, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 2} (or increase your wounded condition by 2 if you are already wounded).

Irezoko Tattoo.name: Irezoko Tattoo
Irezoko Tattoo.description:
Access You are a member of the College of Mysteries

Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the irezoko, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries. Choose a class that you are a member of that grants you access to a focus pool. When you take this feat, it gains the trait that applies to your chosen class. Once per day, you may concentrate upon the pattern of your irezoko to recover 1 Focus Point as a three-action activity.

Iron Lung.name: Iron Lung
Iron Lung.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

Your lungs are infused with the resilience of iron. Treat the result of your save against an inhaled poison as one degree of success better than you rolled. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.GAoUxmcKx1vW3vEB]{Exhale Poison} ability.

It Was Me All Along!.name: It Was Me All Along!
It Was Me All Along!.description:
Частота: раз в день

Требования: Your identity is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, either by magic or a disguise.

You discard a disguise and dramatically reveal your true identity, catching your foes off guard. If you created your disguise using magic such as with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}, you immediately Dismiss the spell as a free action. Stride up to your speed and attempt a Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} one target within 30 feet. If you succeed, you roll twice and take the better result on your first attack roll against that target this turn.

It's Alive!.name: It's Alive!
It's Alive!.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun

You've mastered the use of electrical energy to power your clockwork creations. Whenever your construct companion takes electricity damage, it gains temporary Hit Points equal to either half the electricity damage it took or your level, whichever is lower. These temporary Hit Points last for up to 1 minute.

Janatimo's Lessons.name: Janatimo's Lessons
Janatimo's Lessons.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Legends

Thanks to Janatimo's secret techniques, you can weave your knowledge and words into powerful tools to assist your allies in life-threatening situations. When you use Uzunjati Recollection to tell a story and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about a creature during a combat encounter, if you succeed at both checks, your story carries deeper meaning. This grants your allies a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll and saving throw against the creature during that encounter, as well as to their AC against that creature's next attack roll during that encounter. If you critically succeed at both checks, the bonuses also apply to all attack rolls, saves, and AC against that creature for 2 rounds.

Jellyfish Stance.name: Jellyfish Stance
Jellyfish Stance.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Требования: You are unarmored.

You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity. You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in Jellyfish Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.pkcr9w5x6bKzl3om]{Stance: Jellyfish Stance}

Juggle.name: Juggle
Juggle.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

You can Juggle items and still use your hands between tosses. You can use the Juggle action in several ways.

You can start to Juggle with a single stored item, an item you were carrying, or an unattended item within your reach. The item must be of light or negligible Bulk. You Juggle the item until the end of your next turn, unless you use this feat against next turn to continue Juggling (see below). While you are Juggling, you can use this action again to add another item to the Juggle, which must meet all the same requirements. You can Juggle a number of items equal to one more than the number of hands you are using to Juggle.

You can also use this action to continue Juggling as long as you aren't fatigued. When you do, you continue to Juggle until the end of your next turn. If you do not continue Juggling by the end of your turn, you cease Juggling and you drop all the items. You become fatigued if you continue Juggling for more than 10 minutes (60 rounds) within the course of an hour.

As long as you're Juggling fewer than your maximum number of items, you have a free hand. You can wield weapons you are Juggling (but not shields or other items) as long as they can be wielded in one hand. For example, while you Juggle a dagger in one hand and wield a shield in the other, you are wielding the dagger but still have a free hand to Cast a Spell with a material component. Juggling two or more weapons with one hand doesn't allow you to use feats that require two weapons each held in a different hand.

Juggler Dedication.name: Juggler Dedication
Juggler Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
