Archetype @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Juggler}

You become trained in Performance; if you were already trained in Performance, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.AYb8PmGJ37HwIMwj]{Juggle} skill feat, even if you don't meet its prerequisites.

Особенность: You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained one other feat from the juggler archetype.

Keep Pace (Game Hunter).name: Keep Pace (Game Hunter)
Keep Pace (Game Hunter).description:
Источник: Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon

When your hunted prey tries to bolt, you follow. You Stride up to your Speed, following your hunted prey and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you've moved your full Speed.

You can use Keep Pace to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} instead of Stride if you have the appropriate movement type.

Keep up the Good Fight.name: Keep up the Good Fight
Keep up the Good Fight.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Частота: раз в час

Триггер: A foe's Strike reduces you to 0 Hit Points.

Требования: You had more than 1 Hit Point before the triggering Strike, and the Strike wouldn't kill you.

Your devotion to helping others and doing good keeps you going, even against insurmountable odds. Instead of being knocked out, you are reduced to 1 Hit Point, gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 round, and increase your wounded value by 1.

Knight's Retaliation.name: Knight's Retaliation
Knight's Retaliation.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: An undead creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

You knock the enemy's blow aside and twist, unbalancing your foe. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the triggering creature.

Knock Sense.name: Knock Sense
Knock Sense.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You attack carefully to knock some sense into a creature whose actions aren't their own. Make a Strike against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} ally. The Strike is nonlethal and doesn't take a -2 penalty for using a weapon without the nonlethal trait; if you hit and deal damage, your ally automatically succeeds at the flat check to remove the confused condition when taking damage.

Know the Beat.name: Know the Beat
Know the Beat.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad

You become trained in your choice of Guild Lore, Legal Lore, Mercantile Lore, or Underworld Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks to Gather Information and to checks made to investigate crimes.

Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover.name: Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover
Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society GuideТриггер: You gain no information from a Recall Knowledge check (usually because you failed the secret check) using one of the two skills you chose for this feat.

Kreighton teaches his students that an agile mind can glean clues leading to the truth, even from the most unlikely of sources. You immediately reattempt the triggering check using the other chosen skill.

Особенность: When you gain this feat, choose two of the following skills: Arcana, Crafting, Lore (any one), Medicine, Nature, Occultism, Religion, or Society.

Lead the Way.name: Lead the Way
Lead the Way.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You move forward, creating an opening for others to follow. Choose one adjacent ally who has a reaction available. You Stride, and that ally can use their reaction to immediately Stride. The ally must end their Stride adjacent to you. If the ally Strides in this way, they don't trigger reactions that are normally triggered by movement. You, however, still trigger those reactions normally.

Legendary Tattoo Artist.name: Legendary Tattoo Artist
Legendary Tattoo Artist.description: Your craftsmanship at decorating flesh is unparalleled. You become legendary in Crafting. Whenever you craft a magical tattoo whose level is at least 3 lower than your level, increase all attack roll and DC values of the tattoo's activated abilities by 1, and increase all resistances granted by the tattoo by 1.

Legs of Stone.name: Legs of Stone
Legs of Stone.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

You gain a +2 status bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} you. You can Shove creatures even if you don't have a hand free. When you successfully Shove a foe, you can Stride away from your opponent (instead of toward it), but you must move the same distance in the opposite direction from where you Shoved it.

Levering Strike.name: Levering Strike
Levering Strike.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

Archetype @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Staff Acrobat}

Требования: You are wielding your staff.

Make a Strike with your staff. As long as you don't critically fail, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its DC against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} attempts until the start of your next turn.

Lion's Fury.name: Lion's Fury
Lion's Fury.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple-City

You gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Ak3oHoPDJoMR14yg]{Lion Scythe's} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.zWp7Kcn7mhKyGFxW]{Sun Sling's} critical specialization effects.

Lion's Might.name: Lion's Might
Lion's Might.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple-City

You've trained with the weapons of the Bright Lions. You gain access to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Ak3oHoPDJoMR14yg]{Lion Scythes} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.zWp7Kcn7mhKyGFxW]{Sun Slings}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank with lion scythes and sun slings.

Living for the Applause.name: Living for the Applause
Living for the Applause.description:
Частота: раз в день

Триггер: You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points (but not immediately killed) during a combat encounter that has spectators.

Nothing can stop you as long as you have an audience cheering you on. The attention reinvigorates you and keeps you from being knocked out. You remain at 1 Hit Point, and your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition increases by 1.

In addition, attempt a @Check[type:performance|dc:@self.dc] check; the DC is determined by the GM but is typically the standard DC for your level or the DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on the spectators, whichever is higher. On a success, the crowd erupts in applause and cheers at your comeback, much to the dismay of your enemies. Concern for the crowd's reaction should your opponent deliver a finishing blow gives you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. On a critical success, you don't expend your daily use of Living for the Applause and can use the reaction an additional time on the same day.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.YMdRmEcOlM3uU9Em]{Effect: Living for the Applause}

Lobbed Attack.name: Lobbed Attack
Lobbed Attack.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

Требования: You are Juggling a thrown weapon.

You make a thrown ranged Strike with the required weapon, using the weapon's normal range increment. This attack doesn't trigger reactions, and if the target has never seen you use this feat before, the target is flat-footed against this attack.

Log Roll.name: Log Roll
Log Roll.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

Archetype @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack}

Требования: You and an adjacent creature are both on a narrow surface or uneven ground and the other creature is flat-footed.

You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady. Attempt an Acrobatics check against the adjacent creature's Reflex saving throw DC. On a success, the creature falls. On a critical failure, you fall.

Loose Cannon.name: Loose Cannon
Loose Cannon.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg

Your unpredictable gunfire often catches enemies off guard or hits unprotected areas. Make a ranged Strike with a firearm against a creature that you haven't already attacked on this turn. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage on this Strike equal to the number of weapon damage dice. The Strike gains the following failure effect.

Провал: The firearm misfires, but it doesn't cause the other critical failure effects listed below.

Критический провал: The firearm misfires and also explodes. It becomes broken, and it deals its normal weapon damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] centered on the firearm, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] against your class DC. This damage includes any from the weapon's fundamental and property runes.

Loyal Empath.name: Loyal Empath
Loyal Empath.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

You have incredible empathy for your friends and family, and you have an innate timing for helping others in distress. You can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} reaction to grant a bonus to another creature's Will saving throw. As usual for Aid, you need to prepare by using an action on your turn to encourage the creature to bravely withstand the effect.

Mammoth Charge.name: Mammoth Charge
Mammoth Charge.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra

Требования: You are riding your megafauna companion.

You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to order your megafauna companion to Stride twice. At any point during this movement, you can make a melee Strike against one enemy within reach.

Mammoth Lord Dedication.name: Mammoth Lord Dedication
Mammoth Lord Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra

You've undertaken the ultimate challenge of the Mammoth Lords and tamed a megafauna. You gain a megafauna you tamed as a young animal companion. Your megafauna animal companion must be a megafauna appropriate to the Realm of the Mammoth Lords;. While an animal companion usually starts as Small, you can begin with a Medium version of that animal (changing no statistics other than its size).

Contrary to the usual rules for animal companions, this feat can give you a second animal companion. If you have more than one animal companion, you can adventure with only one of them at a time. You can switch between them like a beastmaster does. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.8kGpUUUSX1sB2OqQ]{Call Companion} action, as the beastmaster archetype, and you follow all the other rules found in the Call Companion sidebar; see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.wdmUH6hdat7jpEWt]{Beastmaster Dedication} for details on this action and the rules for multiple companions.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from this archetype.

Maneuvering Spell.name: Maneuvering Spell
Maneuvering Spell.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Триггер: You begin to Cast a Spell that requires at least 2 actions to cast.

You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stand}. This action can be before or after you Cast the Spell.

Master Skysage Divination.name: Master Skysage Divination
Master Skysage Divination.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

You unlock the most powerful secrets hidden in the stars above. You learn a 7th-level spell from any spell list. At 18th level, you learn an 8th-level spell, and at 20th level, you learn a 9th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from the divination school. You gain master proficiency with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

Master Snowcasting.name: Master Snowcasting
Master Snowcasting.description: You have unlocked the deeper magic of your gelid shard, gaining access to new levels of spells. You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Mastermind's Eye.name: Mastermind's Eye
Mastermind's Eye.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island

When you succeed at identifying a creature using Recall Knowledge, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your attacks until the start of your next turn; if you critically succeed, it's flat-footed against your attacks for 1 minute. This feat serves as the rogue's mastermind racket for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Mature Megafauna Companion.name: Mature Megafauna Companion
Mature Megafauna Companion.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra

You've raised your megafauna companion to be a more powerful force on the battlefield than most of its kind. The companion you gained through the Mammoth Lord Dedication feat becomes a mature animal companion, granting it additional capabilities. During an encounter, even if you don't use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} action, your megafauna animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to Stride or Strike.

Mature Trained Companion.name: Mature Trained Companion
Mature Trained Companion.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God

Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to expert instead of one of the three skill increases for mature. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.CrUPaPlsxy2bswaT]{Mesmerizing Performance} advanced maneuver, rather than the normal advanced maneuver for its type.

Megafauna Veterinarian.name: Megafauna Veterinarian
Megafauna Veterinarian.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra

By heeding the wise advice of elders in your following- and aided by your own experience-you've learned how to provide medical care to the megafauna of the Mammoth Lord followings. You can attempt a Nature check instead of a Medicine check for any of Medicine's trained and untrained uses, provided the subject of your medical care is a megafauna. If you're attempting an action that requires a particular proficiency rank in Medicine (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}), use your proficiency rank in Nature instead. If the subject of your care is your megafauna and you roll a success on your check, you get a critical success instead.

Menacing Prowess.name: Menacing Prowess
Menacing Prowess.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty. When you Demoralize, you can target up to 2 creatures within 30 feet of you at once. If you are a master of Intimidation, you can Demoralize up to 4 creatures at once; if you're legendary, you can Demoralize up to 8 creatures at once.

Mighty Bear.name: Mighty Bear
Mighty Bear.description: The power of the bear within you can expand your physical presence even further. The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} spell you cast with your Great Bear feat is heightened to 4th level.

Mighty Wings.name: Mighty Wings
Mighty Wings.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl

Your dragon wings are now a permanent part of your body, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. If you spend 1 Focus Point to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}, your fly Speed increases to 90 feet for the duration, unless your Speed is faster, and you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws} for the duration.

Mimic Protections.name: Mimic Protections
Mimic Protections.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet

By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} on a foe within 100 feet, you gain resistance 10 to all damage types that target has resistance or immunity to for as long as the foe remains within 100 feet.

Minor Omen.name: Minor Omen
Minor Omen.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

Частота: раз в день

Триггер: You fail a Reflex save.

Требования: You can see the night sky.

The stars warn you of danger in the nick of time. Reroll the failed save and use the new result.

Miraculous Intervention.name: Miraculous Intervention
Miraculous Intervention.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: An adjacent fiend or undead begins to use a reaction.

Through divine intervention or whispered prayers, you foil an enemy's response. If the triggering creature's level is equal to or lower than yours, you disrupt the triggering reaction. If the triggering creature's level is higher than yours, you must make an attack roll or spell attack roll against its AC (your choice). On a success, you disrupt the reaction.

Mockingbird's Disarm.name: Mockingbird's Disarm
Mockingbird's Disarm.description:
Частота: once per minute

Триггер: You succeed at a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} or use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jfsmtOx4QgXB19BL]{Tumbling Strike}, and you moved through an enemy's space.

The Mockingbird is a master at running into foes and coming away with their weapons. Mimicking their skill, you strike at a foe's wrist while tumbling past them, weakening their grip. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the enemy whose space you moved through. You can use Acrobatics instead of Athletics for this check.

Murderer's Circle.name: Murderer's Circle
Murderer's Circle.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing

You Strike a target within reach and then Step to any other open space adjacent to that target. Your target is then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your next Strike this turn.

Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication.name: Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication
Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

You've studied the basics of harmony and resonance in magic, exemplified by the ringing of chimes. You gain a single arcane or occult cantrip of your choice, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level, rounded up. If you weren't already, you become trained in that tradition's spell DCs and spell attack rolls, with Intelligence as your spellcasting ability if you choose arcane or Charisma as your spellcasting ability if you choose occult. Regardless of your choice, you also either become trained in Arcana or Occultism, or an expert in one of these skills if you are already trained in both.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Nantambu Chime-Ringer archetype.

Narrative Conduit.name: Narrative Conduit
Narrative Conduit.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

You act as a conduit for your companions just as your stories are a conduit between teller and listener. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spin a Tale} and the hero of your tale Casts a Spell against the villain, you warp the world, allowing the hero to calculate range and cover to the villain from your space instead of their own if they prefer. The hero must choose to calculate both range and cover from the same space; they can't use one space for range and the other for cover.

Necromantic Bulwark.name: Necromantic Bulwark
Necromantic Bulwark.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Regular exposure to necromantic effects left you better able to defend against them. When you have your shield raised, you gain your shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would deal negative damage. If you have the Shield Block reaction, negative damage you take can trigger the reaction, even though the damage isn't physical damage.

Necromantic Deflection.name: Necromantic Deflection
Necromantic Deflection.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You imbue your shield with life-giving energy to deflect harmful necromantic magic. When you have your shield raised, you gain the shield's circumstance bonus to your AC and saving throws against necromancy spells. If you have the Shield Block reaction, damage you take as a result of a necromancy spell can trigger that reaction, even if it isn't physical damage.

Night's Glow.name: Night's Glow
Night's Glow.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

The stars and moon lend you their light. You gain your choice of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SuBtUJiU6DbSJYIw]{Moonbeam} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Yrek2Yd4k3DPC2zV]{Zenith Star} domain spell. Like your Oatia skysage spells, you cast this focus spell as an occult spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover by using the Refocus to reflect upon or gaze at the stars.

Особенность: You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

Night's Shine.name: Night's Shine
Night's Shine.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

Your power from the moon and stars becomes strong enough to illuminate the night sky. You gain your choice of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KG7amdeXWc7MjGXe]{Asterism} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.oXCwHBeDja4e0Mx0]{Touch of the Moon} domain spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

Особенность: You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

Night's Warning.name: Night's Warning
Night's Warning.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

Триггер: A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker.

Частота: раз в час

Требования: You can see the night sky.

Portents written in the night sky show you how to avoid an attack. The triggering attack roll targets your Occultism DC instead of your AC. Though this allows you to avoid taking penalties to your AC, it doesn't remove any conditions or other effects causing such penalties. For example, an enemy with sneak attack would still deal extra damage to you for being flat-footed, even though you wouldn't take the –2 circumstance penalty when defending against the attack.

Nightwave Springing Reload.name: Nightwave Springing Reload
Nightwave Springing Reload.description: Training with the crew of the Nightwave has taught you their technique for reloading while leaping to board another ship. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and then Interact to reload, or Interact to reload and then Leap. You can perform this ability as a 2-action activity to use your Leap to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} without needing to Stride at least 10 feet first.

No Stranger to Death.name: No Stranger to Death
No Stranger to Death.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Your regular exposure to the insidious putrescence of undeath inured you to its effects. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws made against spells and effects with the death, disease, and evil traits. Whenever you become drained or sickened, reduce the status penalty you take from the condition by 1, to a minimum of 0.

Nonlethal Takedown.name: Nonlethal Takedown
Nonlethal Takedown.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You prefer to use nonlethal means against living opponents, but the weapons you carry are lethal enough to destroy undead. You don't take the normal -2 circumstance penalty when attacking nonlethally with a weapon that lacks the nonlethal trait.

Oatia Skysage Dedication.name: Oatia Skysage Dedication
Oatia Skysage Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

Your study of the stars unlocks supernatural insights and magic. You either become trained in Astronomy Lore or an expert in Occultism.

You learn to cast spontaneous spells and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with two common cantrips of your choice; these cantrips can be from any spell tradition, but they must be divination spells. You cast these spells as occult spells as you draw on the stars and night sky. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs. If you have a hand free and you've gazed at the night sky in the last 24 hours, you can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need to use a spell component pouch. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Intelligence.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.PVwU1LMWcSgD7Q0m]{Oatia Skysage Archetype}.

Ooze Empathy.name: Ooze Empathy
Ooze Empathy.description:
Источник: The Slithering

You can connect with oozes (and other amorphous aberrations, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on oozes and to make very simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of them. In most instances, oozes will give you time to make your case.

Oozemorph Dedication.name: Oozemorph Dedication
Oozemorph Dedication.description:
Источник: The Slithering

You are plagued by sporadic anatomical rearrangements, which grant you insights into other creatures with unusual anatomies. You become trained in Occultism and Ooze Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves to avoid being Engulfed by creatures, and to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} after being Engulfed.

As you develop more abilities based on your amorphous affliction, you become increasingly off-putting to mundane creatures. You take a penalty to Diplomacy checks against animals and humanoids. This penalty is equal to your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype, to a maximum of -4 for four or more feats.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the oozemorph archetype.

Opportune Throw.name: Opportune Throw
Opportune Throw.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

Требования: You are Juggling a thrown weapon.

Триггер: A creature within 10 feet of you uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

You make a thrown ranged Strike with the required weapon against the triggering creature. If you critically succeed and the trigger was a manipulate action, you disrupt that action. This Strike doesn't count against your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Ostentatious Reload.name: Ostentatious Reload
Ostentatious Reload.description:
Требования: You're wielding two one-handed firearms.

Every good Firebrand knows that style can be as important as substance—so long as you don't screw up the delivery. Make a @Check[type:performance|dc:@self.level|adjustment:-2] check against an easy DC for your level as you spin your guns around and juggle ammunition to reload them.

Критический успех: You Interact to reload up to two firearms you are currently wielding.

Успех: You Interact to reload a single firearm you are currently wielding.

Провал: You drop one of the required firearms and a round of ammunition on the ground in your space.

Critical Failure You drop both firearms and two rounds on the ground in your space.

Pactbound Dedication.name: Pactbound Dedication
Pactbound Dedication.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth

You befriended one of the last saumen kar and were infused with a fraction of their power, granting you the potential to become a guardian of their ancient pact. You gain cold resistance equal to half your level. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} while it's snowing even lightly, even if it wouldn't be thick enough to normally grant concealment. Finally, all saumen kar can sense the mark of their pact upon you, and their attitude toward you is typically one step better than it would be otherwise (hostile to unfriendly, unfriendly to indifferent, etc.) Most saumen kar are unfriendly to outsiders; this would make them indifferent to you.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the pactbound initiate archetype.

Pain Tolerance.name: Pain Tolerance
Pain Tolerance.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg

Доступ: You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.

You gain resistance to mental damage equal to half your level and a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you clumsy, drained, or enfeebled.

Paragon Reanimated Companion.name: Paragon Reanimated Companion
Paragon Reanimated Companion.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun

You have reached the pinnacle of necromantic science, creating a mechanical zombie unlike any the world has seen before. Your reanimated construct companion becomes a paragon construct companion.

Peculiar Anatomy.name: Peculiar Anatomy
Peculiar Anatomy.description:
Источник: The Slithering

Your circulatory system contains viscous protoplasmic fluid instead of ordinary blood. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against disease and poison, and resistance to poison damage equal to half your level.

In addition, your resistance to precision damage from Disturbing Defense increases to an amount equal to 7 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype, and the DC of your flat checks to recover from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is 8 rather than 13.

Performance Weapon Expert.name: Performance Weapon Expert
Performance Weapon Expert.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing

Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, as does your proficiency rank for your chosen advanced weapon.

Pesh Skin.name: Pesh Skin
Pesh Skin.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad

Требования: You are transformed into a plant by a polymorph spell.

Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it. Each time a creature touches you, hits you with an unarmed attack, or hits you with a melee weapon attack while adjacent to you, that creature takes 1d6 piercing damage. Increase the damage to 2d6 if the polymorph spell is 8th level or higher, or to 3d6 if it's 10th level.

When an adjacent creature damages you with piercing or slashing damage, it must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or become stupefied 1 (or stupefied 2 on a critical failure) until the end of its next turn.

These benefits last until you're no longer polymorphed into a plant.

Phalanx Formation.name: Phalanx Formation
Phalanx Formation.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You know how to clear a line of fire for your allies. You don't provide lesser cover to enemies against your allies' attacks.

Pin to the Spot.name: Pin to the Spot
Pin to the Spot.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing

You Strike a target within reach. If you hit and deal damage, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} as if you had critically succeeded at an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}.

Pivot Strike.name: Pivot Strike
Pivot Strike.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

Archetype @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Staff Acrobat}

Требования: You are wielding your staff.

You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and then Strike using your staff. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage for the Strike equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. Regardless of whether your Strike hit, you can then attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the target.

Plum Deluge.name: Plum Deluge
Plum Deluge.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

Требования: You have at least three of the same contact poison.

You have learned to saturate an area with poison in imitation of the techniques of your rival, Blue Viper. As part of this ability, you Interact to draw three vials of the same contact poison and throw them in the air, where they shatter and spread a poisonous deluge affecting a 20-foot burst within 60 feet. All creatures in the burst are automatically exposed to the poison, immediately bypassing any onset time, and must attempt a saving throw against that poison. The three vials must be identical, even if the poison can come in multiple types or different levels.

Powder Punch Stance.name: Powder Punch Stance
Powder Punch Stance.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg

Доступ: You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.

You infuse your handwraps with black powder. On your first melee Strike each round with an unarmed attack, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.dgXjUcaoQDAY6ZpO]{Knuckle Duster}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.8eGV6fXbmt2v74uB]{Black Powder Knuckle Dusters}, you deal an additional 1 fire Damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.

Practiced Guidance.name: Practiced Guidance
Practiced Guidance.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn

Making one's way to safety can be harrowing, but you have extensive practice at helping others along that path. When you roll a success to Aid a member of your crop, you get a critical success instead.

Practiced Opposition.name: Practiced Opposition
Practiced Opposition.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You've battled more undead than you care to remember, often with little time to prepare between foes, forcing you to rely on experience and muscle memory to guide your blade. Attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about an undead you can see and then Strike that undead. If your attempt to Recall Knowledge is successful, your Strike treats the target's resistances as 5 lower. The target is then immune to your Practiced Opposition for 24 hours.

Practiced Paddler.name: Practiced Paddler
Practiced Paddler.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

You're skilled at navigating bogs and marshes, even for a paddler shoony. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet.

Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Prayer-Touched Weapon
Prayer-Touched Weapon.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Частота: once per turn

Требования: Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip divine spell.

You coat a weapon you're wielding in prayers and the divine power given to you by your deity. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r 1d6[positive]]]{1d6 positive damage}. As usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.cA6ps8RKE0gysEWr]{Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon}

Predict Weather.name: Predict Weather
Predict Weather.description:
Источник: Pathfinder Kingmaker

By observing often subtle indicators in the environment, you may try to predict the day's weather. Spend 10 minutes outdoors then attempt a @Check[type:survival|dc:20] check. (This check is reduced to @Check[type:survival|dc:15] if you have a commanding view of the region, but increases to @Check[type:survival|dc:30] if conditions are poor, such as attempting to predict weather with impaired visibility). Once you make an attempt to Predict the Weather, you cannot attempt to do so again for 24 hours.

Критический успех:: You accurately predict the day's precipitation, temperature, and wind. You learn if a weather event will occur in the region within the next 24 hours, and if so, what the event is and approximately when it will occur. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks made to prepare for this weather event.

Успех: You accurately predict the day's precipitation, temperature, and wind. You learn if a weather event will occur in the region during the next 24 hours, but not what that event will be or when it will take place. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks made to prepare for this weather event.

Критический провал: You come to a dramatically wrong conclusion. The GM provides information to you as though you had received a critical success, including the specifics of a weather event that will not occur that day (instead, a different event-or no event-may occur).

Prepare Papers.name: Prepare Papers
Prepare Papers.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg

You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ftG89SjTSa9DYDOD]{Create Forgery} as an exploration activity. It takes you about 1 hour per page of the document that you're forging. This time is reduced to 10 minutes per page if you're legendary in Society.

Preventative Treatment.name: Preventative Treatment
Preventative Treatment.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You provide preventative remedies and care to help your patient fight off future maladies. You Treat a Condition the target doesn't yet have, naming any condition you could normally treat with Treat Condition. The counteract check gains the secret trait, so the GM rolls it secretly. The next time within the next minute the creature would be affected by that condition, your treatment immediately attempts to reduce the condition value with the effects of Treat Condition, using the secret roll result for the check. Preventative Treatment lasts on a creature for 1 minute, until the treatment is used, or until you use Preventative Treatment again on that creature, whichever comes first.

Protective Spirit Mask.name: Protective Spirit Mask
Protective Spirit Mask.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients

Your mask carries the protective instincts of White Bull, the Horn Forger, and no one will hurt your allies while you have anything to say about it. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only one ally, you can choose to have the spell also give that creature a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.kzSjzK72CQ67wfBH]{Effect: Protective Spirit Mask}

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.KIU5eDZP9VyQIfas]{Protector's Interdiction} reaction.

Provocator Dedication.name: Provocator Dedication
Provocator Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing

Доступ: Successfully defeat the eberarks in the Irorium.

For you, fighting is as much about style as skill. You become trained in simple weapons, martial weapons, and one advanced weapon of your choice. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using your chosen advanced weapon, you also apply the critical specialization of that weapon. You become an expert in Performance and your choice of either Acrobatics or Athletics. If you were an expert in all three of these skills, you instead become an expert in a skill of your choice.

Особенность: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the provocator archetype.

Public Execution.name: Public Execution
Public Execution.description:
Требования: You have designated a mark using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{Mark for Death}.

Some rebel Firebrand cells make a practice of publicly declaring the main target of a given operation. You announce your intention to kill your mark for all to hear and reveal the reason they must die, perhaps listing their crimes or sharing a damning secret. Creatures within 30 feet who can see and hear you are shocked by your proclamation or otherwise reluctant to come to your mark's aid. They must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. On a failure, the creature can't attack you or otherwise perform hostile actions against you until the end of your next turn. If you use a hostile action against a creature other than your mark, this effect ends. Your mark becomes temporarily immune to your Public Execution for 1 day.

Purifying Breeze.name: Purifying Breeze
Purifying Breeze.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Требования: Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell with the healing trait.

You transfer the divine essence of your magic to the air around you, cleansing it of toxins. Attempt a counteract check against each airborne disease or poison effect in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15-foot radius} around you. Regardless of your success or failure, until the beginning of your next turn, all creatures in the purified area gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.7MQLLkQACZt8cspt]{Effect: Purifying Breeze}

Push Back the Dead!.name: Push Back the Dead!
Push Back the Dead!.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You call to your ally and strengthen their resolve and abilities to defend against the horrific tricks undead bring to bear. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead. It also gains resistance to damage from Strikes made by undead creatures equal to half your Charisma modifier.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.OeZ0E1oUKyGPxPy0]{Effect: Push Back the Dead!}

Pyrophilic Recovery.name: Pyrophilic Recovery
Pyrophilic Recovery.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley

You rely on fire and extreme heat to sprout and regrow. Whenever you take fire damage, at the beginning of your next turn, you regain Hit Points equal to half your character level (minimum 1). The total number of Hit Points you recover in this way, including any adjustments that increase the effects of healing, can't exceed half the Hit Points you lost from the fire damage you took. For example, if an effect deals 15 fire Damage and you have fire resistance 5, you would take 10 fire Damage and Pyrophilic Recovery could recover at most 5 Hit Points, regardless of any other effects that increase healing. If you take fire damage more than once before your next turn, the Hit Points recovered from Pyrophilic Recovery are cumulative, though still no more than half the fire damage taken each time.

Quick Juggler.name: Quick Juggler
Quick Juggler.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

When you start to juggle or add another item to those you are Juggling, you add two items instead of one. Increase the maximum number of items you can Juggle by one.

Quick Positioning.name: Quick Positioning
Quick Positioning.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon

Требования: You could see your hunted prey when you rolled initiative at the beginning of the encounter, and this is your first action on your first turn of the encounter.

You're always ready to get the jump on your target. You Step up to twice.

Quick Setup.name: Quick Setup
Quick Setup.description:
You have learned to setup simple crafting jobs with ease. Your setup time for consumables that are at least 6 levels lower than you is 1 day, and your setup time for permanent items 6 levels lower than you is 3 days.

If you rush the setup and reduce the setup time for consumables at least 6 levels lower than you to less than 1 day, you can instead set them up in just 2 hours (allowing you to do so during an adventuring day if you have access to your tools and materials). If you rush the setup of a permanent item at least 6 levels lower than you and reduce the setup time to less than 1 day, you can perform the setup in 4 hours.

Quick Spring.name: Quick Spring
Quick Spring.description: Ishii Bunji is a skilled tumbler, and learning his technique allows you to propel yourself across the battlefield faster than your enemies can react. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}, you Stride up to twice your Speed.

Quicken Heartbeat.name: Quicken Heartbeat
Quicken Heartbeat.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

Частота: once per turn

You've replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine. You reduce your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} condition by 1. Alternatively, if you are not slowed, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} during your next turn, and can use your extra action to Stride or Strike.

Rain of Embers Stance.name: Rain of Embers Stance
Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide

Требования: You are unarmored.

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that flicker with dancing flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Im5JBInybWFbHEYS]{Stance: Rain of Embers Stance}

Ravening's Desperation.name: Хищное отчаяние(*)
Ravening's Desperation.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

Учение Чудовища Глаттондарка научило вас тому, как выжить в самых сложных обстоятельствах, а не поддаваться слабости. До тех пор, пока ваши текущие ОЗ меньше половины ваших максимальных ОЗ, вы получаете бонус обстоятельства +1 к проверкам Выживания и Скрытности. Если ваши текущие ОЗ меньше четверти ваших максимальных ОЗ, бонус обстоятельства равен +2.

Reach Beyond.name: Reach Beyond
Reach Beyond.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island

You've learned to move your spiritual energy past yourself to attack spirits where others can't. You can make melee Strikes against incorporeal creatures that are inside solid objects as long as the object is within your reach. An incorporeal creature inside of a solid object is hidden, requiring you to succeed at a DC 11 flat check when you target it. You can spend an action, which has the concentrate trait, to focus on a creature inside of a solid object. If you do, the next melee Strike you make this turn requires you to succeed at only a DC 6 flat check to affect the creature.

Reading the Signs.name: Чтение знаков(*)
Reading the Signs.description: У вас есть умение вытягивать нужную карту, будь то из колоды харро, в карточной игре или даже из @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Gyi4IVrAVJRPJF2s]{Колоды многих вещей}. Когда вы пытаетесь совершить проверку навыка, включающую вытягивание карт или применение эффектов эффекта прорицания (включая попытку спасброска от враждебного против вас эффекта прорицания), вы получаете бонус состояния +2 к проверке. Когда вы берете карту, чтобы определить свое знамение харро, выполняете Колдовство харро, сотворяете @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ofAQyLtLEGnOIs3N]{Гадание Харро}, или вы активируете магическую колоду карт, возьмите 2 карты и выберите ту, которую вы предпочитаете в качестве фактической взятой карты. Вы даже можете использовать эту способность при взятии карты из колоды многих вещей, но только один раз на колоду. Неиспользованная карта замешивается обратно в стопку.

Rebel's Map.name: Rebel's Map
Rebel's Map.description:
Триггер: You roll initiative.

Rebellions require an intricate knowledge of one's surroundings—because you might need to escape at any moment. You remember the locations of escape routes, ambush spots, and cover from a scouting expedition or a previous visit to the area. Roll a [[/r 1d20]]{d20}. At any point during the subsequent combat, you can substitute the result of this roll instead of rolling a d20 on one Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion} or on one Stealth check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}.

Reclaim Spell.name: Reclaim Spell
Reclaim Spell.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet

You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections. You reclaim the magic of an ongoing spell, using it reprepare a spell with a duration.

You Dismiss a Spell of 4th level or lower that you cast today from a spell slot with at least half its duration remaining, even if that spell can't normally be Dismissed.

You can then spend 10 minutes to reprepare the spell in that spell slot, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.a1TSGGsA6b5gjP3H]{Reprepare Spell}.

Reclaimant Plea.name: Reclaimant Plea
Reclaimant Plea.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You call on the power of the Crimson Oath to gain magical aid. Choose one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]{Searing Light}. You can Cast that Spell once per day as a 4th-level divine innate spell. At 14th level, the spell heightens to 5th level, and at 16th level, the spell heightens to 6th level. If you anger the mysterious source of the Crimson Oath's power, you lose the ability to cast the spell until you atone.

Особенность: You can select this feat a second time at 14th level, gaining a second spell from the list above, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.E3X2RbzWHCdz7gsk]{Flame Strike}, which you can cast once per day; you also become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls. You can select this feat a third time at 18th level, gaining either a third spell from the list above, death ward, flame strike, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst}, which you can cast once per day; additionally, all three spells from this feat heighten to 7th level, and you become a master of divine spell attacks and spell DCs.

Reflecting Riposte.name: Reflecting Riposte
Reflecting Riposte.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet

Триггер: An opponent casts a spell and you critically succeed at a saving throw against it.

Требования: You have a shield raised or are benefiting from Dueling Parry or Twin Parry.

You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts. Use your attack roll modifier with your shield or parrying weapon for your counteract check. If you counteract the spell, it is reflected upon the caster. If the spell targeted individual creatures, it targets the caster only. If the spell targeted an area centered on a point, the new area is centered on the caster. If the spell was a cone or line, the cone or line emanates from you toward the caster. If the spell has a save DC, it uses your class DC, and if it requires a spell attack roll, use the same attack roll modifier as the counteract check.

Reflexive Catch.name: Reflexive Catch
Reflexive Catch.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On

Требования: The item or thrown weapon is of a Bulk you can Juggle. If the trigger was a thrown weapon attack targeting you, you can't be flat-footed to the attack. If you were already Juggling, you can't be Juggling your maximum number of items.

Триггер: An item falls within your reach or an attacker fails an attack roll to hit you or a creature within your reach with a thrown weapon.

You grab the triggering item. If you are Juggling, you can immediately add the item to the objects you're Juggling as a free action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits.

Relentless Disarm.name: Relentless Disarm
Relentless Disarm.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad

When you succeed, but don't critically succeed, at a check to Disarm a creature, your circumstance bonus to further checks to Disarm that creature is +4 instead of +2. Other creatures gain only the normal bonus.

When you critically succeed at a Disarm check, you can immediately Demoralize your target as a reaction.

Reliable Squire.name: Reliable Squire
Reliable Squire.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You know the path to victory isn't traveled alone, and you lend aid to your companions whenever you can. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid. If you roll a critical failure on a check to Aid, you get a failure instead.

Reminder of the Greater Fear.name: Reminder of the Greater Fear
Reminder of the Greater Fear.description:
Источник: Night of the Gray Death

Частота: once per 10 minutes

Триггер: Another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you would gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition.

You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear. Reduce the value of the frightened condition the creature would take by 1.

Repulse the Wicked.name: Repulse the Wicked
Repulse the Wicked.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: An undead within your reach critically fails an attack roll targeting you.

You use your foe's failure as an opening to push them away. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the undead.

Resilient Mind.name: Resilient Mind
Resilient Mind.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You're firm in your convictions and have girded your mind against outside influence. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against mental effects. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects originating from undead.

Resolute Defender.name: Resolute Defender
Resolute Defender.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You hold your shield together with the power of your faith and conviction, refusing to let wood splinter and steel shatter until the day's battles are won. If a shield would be destroyed due to damage taken during your Shield Block, the shield remains intact at 1 Hit Point instead. Its construction is weakened until you repair it, preventing you from using Resolute Defender to save the same shield again until your next daily preparations.

Restore Omen.name: Восстановить знамение(*)
Restore Omen.description:
Требования: У вас нет активного знамения харро.

Вы проводите 10 минут, медитируя с колодой харро, затем берете карту. Масть карты дает вам новое знамение харро.

Retaliatory Cleansing.name: Retaliatory Cleansing
Retaliatory Cleansing.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: You would take damage from an adjacent creature's Strike.

Требования: You're holding holy water or a bomb that deals positive damage in one of your hands.

You twist your hand in front of the blow, ensuring the enemy's attack shatters the required holy water or bomb. The creature takes the on-hit and splash damage from the holy water or required bomb, not counting any additional effects you would add or apply when you throw the bomb, such as weapon specialization or Calculated Splash. You're splashed by the holy water or required bomb, although since positive damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing, it's unlikely you will take damage.

Reveal Machinations.name: Reveal Machinations
Reveal Machinations.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn

You reveal that you played a minor but recurring role in another humanoid's life-or at least convince them that's the case. Attempt a Deception check against the target's Will DC. On a success, the revelation makes them frightened 2, and on a critical success they are frightened 3. In addition, you gain information about the subject as though you had attempted to Recall Knowledge about them using an appropriate skill and received the same result on your roll. You can't use this ability against the same humanoid again until 1 day has passed and you've also successfully disguised yourself as a different person.

Ringmaster's Introduction.name: Ringmaster's Introduction
Ringmaster's Introduction.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet

Требования: The ally hasn't acted in the current combat.

Триггер: An ally's turn begins.

You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} this turn and can spend the extra action to Stride, Strike, Demoralize, Feint, or Perform.

Roll With it (Kingmaker).name: Roll With it (Kingmaker)
Roll With it (Kingmaker).description:
Источник: Pathfinder Kingmaker

Триггер: Your hunted prey, which must be a giant, hits you with a melee attack.

You can dodge attacks from giants. Attempt a Reflex save using 10 + the giant's attack bonus as the save DC. If the result allows you to Stride as part of the reaction, you may instead Fly or Swim if you have the corresponding movement type.

Критический успех:: The attack misses you (or if the attack was a critical hit, it becomes a regular hit). You can Stride up to 10 feet as part of the reaction; if you do so, the reaction gains the move trait.

Успех: The attack deals half damage. You can Stride up to 5 feet as part of the reaction, but you must end this movement adjacent to the triggering giant. If you do so, the reaction gains the move trait.

Критический провал: You fail to avoid the attack and are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} by the blow.

Rolling Landing.name: Rolling Landing
Rolling Landing.description: You land with quick rolls that help you keep your momentum. If you fall and don't take damage (usually due to treating the fall as a shorter distance), you can use your reaction to immediately enter a short roll when you land and Step. If you are an expert in Acrobatics, you can use your reaction to Step or Stride up to half your Speed. If you're a master in Acrobatics, you can use your reaction to Step or Stride up to your full Speed. If you're legendary in Acrobatics, you don't trigger reactions triggered by movement when you Stride in this way.

Rope Mastery.name: Rope Mastery
Rope Mastery.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Ropes are your tool of choice, and you deploy them in versatile ways. When Climbing a rope, you move 5 more feet on a success and 10 more feet on a critical success, to a maximum of your Speed. This additional movement stacks with the effects of Quick Climb. In addition, you can use a rope to hamper your foes. When holding a rope, you can attempt an Athletics check to Disarm, Grapple, or Trip a creature up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. If you critically fail such a check while holding a rope, you can drop the rope to take the effects of a failure instead of a critical failure.

Rubbery Skin.name: Rubbery Skin
Rubbery Skin.description:
Источник: The Slithering

Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality. You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage equal to 2 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype. You also gain resistance equal to twice that amount to extra damage from critical hits; if the resistance is greater than the extra damage, it reduces the extra damage to 0 but doesn't reduce the attack's normal damage.

Ruby Resurrection.name: Ruby Resurrection
Ruby Resurrection.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

Частота: раз в день

Триггер: You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points.

In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes. Change your current Hit Points to 30 and cast a 6th-level fireball centered on yourself. This fireball doesn't affect you. Your hair turns brilliant red for 1 hour.

If you haven't used Ruby Resurrection and you die, you stay in initiative order and Ruby Resurrection triggers automatically at the start of your next turn, bringing you back to life at 0 HP before having its normal effects. This happens only if there are some remains to resurrect; for instance, if you were killed by disintegrate you wouldn't return.

Особенность: This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast.

Rule of Three.name: Rule of Three
Rule of Three.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

Требования: You have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spun a Tale}.

Триггер: The villain of the tale you've spun makes an attack roll with a given weapon or unarmed attack, uses a particular special ability (such as a Breath Weapon), or Casts a Spell against the hero, and they used that same attack, special ability, or spell against the hero on the previous turn.

Heroes learn from their previous failures, often succeeding on the third attempt. You narrate a tale of the hero's success, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC or saving throw against the triggering effect. If the villain has used the same effect against the hero on both of their last two turns, and you used Rule of Three on that effect last turn as well, the bonus increases to +4.

Sacred Armaments.name: Sacred Armaments
Sacred Armaments.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Through the power of your faith or the blessing of a priest, your weapons are fully effective against incorporeal creatures. Weapons you wield have the effects of a ghost touch property rune for as long as you wield them.

Say That Again!.name: Say That Again!
Say That Again!.description:
Источник: Pathfinder Kingmaker

Триггер: An opponent gets a critical failure when attempting to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} you or Lie to you.

The world is full of obnoxious weasels who think they can pull one over on you-put them in their place! When an adjacent creature attempts to Lie to you or to Demoralize you and gets a critical failure on the roll, you can use your reaction to make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} attempt against that opponent. If combat results, you can roll Intimidation for your initiative check.

Scamper Underfoot.name: Scamper Underfoot
Scamper Underfoot.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

You are used to ducking under foes and can scurry around the battlefield with ease. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} the spaces of Medium or larger enemies, and the presence of an enemy doesn't make the squares difficult terrain.

Scapegoat Parallel Self.name: Scapegoat Parallel Self
Scapegoat Parallel Self.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

Частота: раз в день

Триггер: Your turn starts or your oracular curse would advance.

Seeing Syndara superimpose creatures with similar metaphysical properties, you've realized a way to manipulate the effects of your oracular curse. You immediately change your curse to its minor, moderate, or major stage, or back to its mild form, exchanging the curse effect with that of a parallel version of yourself in another reality.

Scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
Scarecrow.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn

You fight fiercely to protect your crop. When you hit a creature that is adjacent to two or more members of your crop with a weapon or unarmed attack, you gain a circumstance bonus to your damage roll equal to the number of weapon damage dice. When you hit a creature who has a member of your crop grabbed, that member can attempt to Escape using a reaction.a

Scholar's Hunch.name: Scholar's Hunch
Scholar's Hunch.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch

Частота: раз в час

Триггер: You fail a Lore or Occultism skill check.

Scholarly debates have taught you to think on your feet. Reroll the failed check and use the new result.

Scion of Domora Dedication.name: Посвящение потомка Домора(*)
Scion of Domora Dedication.description:
Вы получаете духа-проводника союзника. Ваш фамильяр принимает форму определенного фамильяра духа-проводника.

Особенность: Вы можете взять Посвящение потомка Домора, даже если у вас есть @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.4zaU3GlTGMNqLFS8]{Посвящение мастера фамильяра} и вы не взяли две других способности @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.yaR8E2drX6pFUFCK]{Мастера фамильяра}. Вы не можете выбрать другую способность посвящения, пока не получите по крайней мере две других способности архетипов Потомка Домора или Мастера Фамильяра.

Secret Eater.name: Secret Eater
Secret Eater.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger

You have discovered and found favor with the cult within the church of Kabriri known as the Secret Eaters. You have maggots that writhe under your skin with the power to wriggle out from between your teeth, glean secrets from those you devour, and whisper them telepathically into your mind. Once per hour when you Consume Flesh, you can select a single Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill whose secrets you wish to uncover. You become subject to the effects of corpse communion as if you had critically succeeded at casting the ritual: you learn a significant piece of lore, a forgotten secret, or some other tantalizing nugget of knowledge that is of immediate use to you.

Secret Speech.name: Secret Speech
Secret Speech.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn

Choose a secret society (such as the Lacunafex or the Bellflower Network). You've learned that society's secret cant or jargon, enabling you to share hidden messages when signing or speaking with others who've also learned it. If an observer succeeds at a Perception check against your Deception DC when you do this, they realize you are passing a message but fail to discern its content, unless they subsequently succeed at a Society check against your Deception DC. On a critical success, they learn not only the message, but also who you're passing the message to.

Особенность: You can take this feat multiple times. You learn the secret speech of a different society each time.

Self Destruct.name: Self Destruct
Self Destruct.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun

Триггер: Your reanimated clockwork companion is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Требования: You're within 60 feet of your reanimated clockwork companion.

You've installed a self-destruct device within your construct companion, which you can trigger with a special device from up to 60 feet away. When you activate the device, your reanimated construct companion explodes, dealing [[/r 2d6[fire]]]{2d6 fire damage} per level to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30-foot radius}. Creatures caught in the blast can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save, with a DC equal to the higher of your class DC or spell DC.

[[/r ((2*@actor.level)d6)[fire]]]{Leveled Fire Damage}

Sense Alignment.name: Sense Alignment
Sense Alignment.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace

You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos. The GM rolls a secret Perception check, comparing the result against the target's Deception DC.

Критический успех: You ascertain the target's alignment.

Успех: You ascertain the target's alignment, but only along one axis (your choice of either the good-evil axis or the lawful-chaotic axis).

Провал: You do not learn the target's alignment.

Критический провал: You incorrectly ascertain the target's alignment, misidentifying their alignment along either one axis or both (GM's choice).

Sense Ki.name: Sense Ki
Sense Ki.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

You can read the presence of ki in your area. You gain imprecise lifesense out to a range of 30 feet.

Senses of the Bear.name: Senses of the Bear
Senses of the Bear.description: While in ursine form, you gain low-light vision and scent (imprecise) 30 feet. If you already had low-light vision, you instead gain darkvision.

Sever Space.name: Sever Space
Sever Space.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain

Требования: You are wielding a weapon that deals slashing damage or have an unarmed Strike that deals slashing damage.

You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range. Make a melee Strike with the required weapon or unarmed attack. The attack gains an 80-foot reach for this Strike.

After the Strike, regardless of whether it succeeded, the world rushes to fill the space you destroyed, bringing you and the target adjacent to each other. You can choose to teleport to the closest space adjacent to the target or to attempt to teleport the target adjacent to you. If you choose the target, they can negate the teleportation if they succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC.

Shape of the Cloud Dragon.name: Shape of the Cloud Dragon
Shape of the Cloud Dragon.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl

You've discovered how to transform yourself into a cloud dragon. Once per day, you can cast 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} as an innate arcane spell, transforming into a cloud dragon. The spell automatically heightens to 8th level if you're 16th level and 9th level if you're 18th level.

On a critical hit with an unarmed Strike gained from dragon form, you recharge the spell's breath weapon immediately.

While in this form, you gain the following cloud dragon–specific abilities:

  • Cloud cloud walk (you can walk on clouds or fog);
    • Melee 1 jaws, Урон: 2d10 piercing plus 1d12 electricity;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Урон: 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Урон: 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horn (reach 10 feet), Урон: 3d8 piercing;
    • Breath Weapon 30-foot cone, 6d12 electricity.

Особенность: You can use this feat in place of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.eR0sifECG27CC4do]{Shape Of The Dragon} to fulfill feat requirements.

Shaped Contaminant.name: Shaped Contaminant
Shaped Contaminant.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad

Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely. When you activate an inhaled poison, you can cause it to fill a 20-foot line that's 5 feet tall rather than a 10-foot cube. You gain a +3 status bonus to saving throws against inhaled poisons that you activate.

Shared Sight.name: Shared Sight
Shared Sight.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You bestow the mystical vision granted to you by your muse upon your allies. If your next action is to cast a non-cantrip spell that affects one or more of your allies, all affected allies gain your spiritsense for 1 minute.

Shepherd of Desolation.name: Shepherd of Desolation
Shepherd of Desolation.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

You know how to keep others alive in the Gravelands' murkiest shadows. Allies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} of you gain the benefit of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.n7LTwKUSATLaQ9FD]{Survivor of Desolation}. If you are a champion, this aura is a champion aura, even though you gained it from Knight Reclaimant instead of a champion feat or feature.

Shield Wall.name: Shield Wall
Shield Wall.description:
Источник: Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Триггер: Your shield is raised and an adjacent ally Raises a Shield.

You use your shield in tandem with an ally's, forming a barricade. Both you and the triggering creature have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Standard Cover} as long as you remain adjacent to each other and you both have your shields raised; when this is no longer the case, the effect ends. You and your ally can't use this cover to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, as it's obvious you're standing there holding your shields, but you and your ally can use it to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover}. Normally, if you and your ally don't move, Shield Wall lasts until the beginning of your next turn, when your shield is no longer raised.

Shift Spell.name: Shift Spell
Shift Spell.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Доступ: member of the Magaambya

Требования: You have an active spell that affects an area and you are within the spell's range.

You move the spell's area to a new location within 120 feet. The spell's remaining duration is reduced by half. The spell no longer affects its previous area.

Shoony Lore.name: Shoony Lore
Shoony Lore.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadow

Growing up in shoony society, you learned the value of honesty, friendship, and hard work, even during trying times. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Diplomacy and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Shoony Lore.

Show-Off.name: Show-Off
Show-Off.description:
Частота: once per minute

Триггер: You succeed at an Acrobatics or Athletics check deemed suitably challenging and meaningful by the GM.

As is the tradition with many Firebrands, you call your shot and look to impress with an extra bit of panache or a greater stunt. Attempt the triggering check again, using the second result. On a success, you gain the normal results of the check, plus you feel invigorated by your stunt and gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level (double your level on a critical success). You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute. Typically, a challenging task is one with at least a standard DC for your level, though the difficulty may be higher depending on the situation. A meaningful context is one where the action's success or failure is relevant to the pursuit of your goals.

Silent Sting.name: Silent Sting
Silent Sting.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Триггер: You make a Strike with a weapon of light bulk.

You quickly hide your weapon to make it difficult to pin the attack on you. You attempt to Conceal an Object to hide the triggering weapon. Your Stealth check is compared to the Perception DC of all creatures within 30 feet that can see you. You automatically succeed against creatures farther than 30 feet. The target of your Strike gains a +4 circumstance bonus to their Perception DC for this check. If your Stealth check is a success, you hide your weapon so well that the creature can't clearly determine where the attack originated.

Silver's Refrain.name: Silver's Refrain
Silver's Refrain.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn

You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xM35hJacTM1BSXUl]{Silver's Refrain} composition cantrip, which aids you when fighting devils.

Simple Crystal Magic.name: Simple Crystal Magic
Simple Crystal Magic.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City

As long as you meditate before a gemstone worth at least 10 gp as part of your daily preparations, you are capable of seeing magic as flowing runes that reveal information about magic objects, and you can scribe a personal rune that represents you. You gain the read aura and sigil cantrips. You cast these cantrips as arcane innate spells at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Sing to the Steel.name: Sing to the Steel
Sing to the Steel.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat. You and your allies within 30 feet gain the effects of one of the following runes until the end of your next turn: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Wm0X7Pfd1bfocPSv]{Corrosive}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Disrupting}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.M5M1WJ5KzbYfRGsY]{Frost}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.dTxbaa7HSiJbIuNN]{Thundering}. The effects apply to a single weapon the creature is holding or one of the creature's unarmed attacks. You choose the rune and the effect applies to all creatures. You can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to extend the duration of the rune for 1 additional round up to a maximum of 1 minute. If this would give a weapon or unarmed attack more property runes than its normal maximum, an existing property rune (as the creature chooses) is suppressed until the spell ends.

Six Pillars Stance.name: Six Pillars Stance
Six Pillars Stance.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!

Требования: You are unarmored.

You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed. While in this stance, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.P80mwvCAEncR2snK]{Stance: Six Pillars Stance}

Sixth Pillar Dedication.name: Sixth Pillar Dedication
Sixth Pillar Dedication.description:
Источник: Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!
